T02TD1363E:168a-1: shr'i k'a la tsakra s'a dha na yo ga pa d'i p'a hva yam ;
T02TD1363E:168a-3: dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs rnal 'byor rab gsal zhes bya ba /
T02TD1363E:168a-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1363E:168a-5: gang gi byams pas 'jig rten la gzigs pa //
T02TD1363E:168a-6: dkyil 'khor gsum gyi gal ba sna tshogs 'di //
T02TD1363E:168a-7: de ni dpal ldan dus 'khor ting 'dzin rgyal //
T02TD1363E:168a-8: rdo rje 'dzin pas khyed la phun tshogs mdzod //
T02TD1363E:168a-9: byang chub sems dpas mdzad pa'i rgyas 'grel sogs //
T02TD1363E:168a-10: med par mkhas pas rgyud mang rtogs pa min //
T02TD1363E:168a-11: dang po'i sangs rgyas thos nas rdzogs byang chub //
T02TD1363E:168a-12: legs grub gnyer rnyed phyir na bde thob 'gyur //
T02TD1363E:168a-13: de yi sgrub thabs rjes dran bya ba la //
T02TD1363E:168a-14: bdag ni mkhas min sdeb sbyor mchog yod min //
T02TD1363E:168a-15: de lta na yang rang nyid dran ched du //
T02TD1363E:168a-16: bdag gis bgyid de mkhas rnams bzod par mdzod //
T02TD1363E:168a-17: rlung me chu sa lhun po dang //
T02TD1363E:168a-18: sna tshogs chu skyes dkyil padmar //
T02TD1363E:168a-19: zla nyi sgra gcan bdud dbang phyug / rol par g-yas brkyang zhabs gzhol zhing //
T02TD1363E:168a-20: sna tshogs yum la snyoms 'jug pa //
T02TD1363E:168a-21: gcig tu rang gzhan don phun tshogs //
T02TD1363E:168a-22: sku bzhi'i dag nyid zhi ba ni //
T02TD1363E:168a-23: gnyis su med cing rtog pa spangs //
T02TD1363E:168a-24: 'gyur med bde ba chen po gang //
T02TD1363E:168a-25: stong pa nyid dang snying rje'i bdag / de dran chos dang rjes mthun pas //
T02TD1363E:168a-26: sgrub thabs kun du 'dris par bya ;
T02TD1363E:168a-27: / srid pa'i skye bar kun rmongs las skyes pa'i //
T02TD1363E:168a-28: mngal gyi sdug bsngal dag kyang mtha' yas shing //
T02TD1363E:168a-29: byis pa gzhon nu nyid dang long tsho dang //
T02TD1363E:168a-30: rgan po la yang srid par bar du 'jig / de la mi yi dngos po rnyed dka' ste //
T02TD1363E:168a-31: chos bzhin spyod pa shin du rnyed par dka' //
T02TD1363E:168a-32: sangs rgyas 'byung dang theg pa chen po dang //
T02TD1363E:168a-33: de la gus pa 'ang shin tu rnyed par dka' //
T02TD1363E:168a-34: brtan rnams mtha' dag gsang ba'i bsam gtan la'ang //
T02TD1363E:168a-35: gang zhig tshe na rab tu 'jug par byed //
T02TD1363E:168a-36: de las sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba la //
T02TD1363E:168a-37: ae ma'o 'jug pa shin tu dka' ba nyid //
T02TD1363E:168b-0: des na blo ldan rnams kyi mgo dang @168b ni ;
T02TD1363E:168b-1: / gos la me shor bzlog pa ltar sgrub bya //
T02TD1363E:168b-2: snying rje che ldan rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD1363E:168b-3: rmongs dang nga rgyal la sogs spang //
T02TD1363E:168b-4: chu sogs bden dang rjes gnang dang //
T02TD1363E:168b-5: bum pa gsang ba mchog gsum dang //
T02TD1363E:168b-6: shes rab chen po'i dbang bskur ba //
T02TD1363E:168b-7: bla ma dam pa'i rim thob pa //
T02TD1363E:168b-8: gang nas skyong chos ldan zhing //
T02TD1363E:168b-9: skye dgu rnams kyang bder gnas la //
T02TD1363E:168b-10: gang na sa 'dzin rtsod med pa //
T02TD1363E:168b-11: der ni bsgrub pa brtsam par bya //
T02TD1363E:168b-12: skyed tshal ri bo rgyal ba bzhugs //
T02TD1363E:168b-13: grub pa'i lha gnas stong pa dang //
T02TD1363E:168b-14: dur khrod dang ni chu 'gram dang //
T02TD1363E:168b-15: gnas gtsang dang ni sa phug dang //
T02TD1363E:168b-16: gang du sems ni nyams dga' bar //
T02TD1363E:168b-17: ci 'byor pas ni mchod par bya //
T02TD1363E:168b-18: dang por re zhig rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1363E:168b-19: kun nas srung ba'i 'khor lo bsam //
T02TD1363E:168b-20: bde ba'i lam la stan 'dug nas //
T02TD1363E:168b-21: sngon du khro dbang nga rgyal bya //
T02TD1363E:168b-22: snying gar sna tshogs chu skyes nyi //
T02TD1363E:168b-23: dbus su sa bon h'um bsgom bya //
T02TD1363E:168b-24: de 'od dkyil gsal srung 'khor mchog / rgyal rgya mtsho gtsor bsgoms nas //
T02TD1363E:168b-27: mchod pa bla na med byas nas //
T02TD1363E:168b-28: stong pa nyid la dmigs par bya //
T02TD1363E:168b-29: lha yi skur ni bskyed pa dang //
T02TD1363E:168b-30: lus sogs rnam par sbyong ba rnams //
T02TD1363E:168b-31: rim pa ji bzhin brjod bya ste //
T02TD1363E:168b-32: de rnams sngags kyang go rims bzhin //
T02TD1363E:168b-33: aom a'a:h'um ho ham ksha:pradzonya p'a y'atm'a ka k'a ya w'a ktsi tta dzny'a n'a dhi pa te ma ma k'a ya w'aktsi tta badzram badzr'a mri ta sva bh'a bam ku ru ku ru skandha dh'a tvo ya ta nam ni sva bh'a pam sv'a h'a /
T02TD1363E:168b-34: de nas gtsug tor steng gi char //
T02TD1363E:168b-35: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nya gang ba //
T02TD1363E:168b-36: de ni wam las byung ba bsgom //
T02TD1363E:168b-37: gtsug tor nas ni rkang sen mthar ;
T02TD1363E:168b-38: / sbrul gyi shun pa bzhin du ni //
T02TD1363E:168b-39: lan gsum dor bas gnyug ma'i lus //
T02TD1363E:168b-40: bdag gi lus de de nas ni //
T02TD1363E:168b-41: dge ba'i las la zla bar bsam //
T02TD1363E:168b-42: dbang sogs rgyas par ma brjod do //
T02TD1363E:168b-43: gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya //
T02TD1363E:168b-44: aom sva bh'a wa shuddha:sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a wa shuddho& ham /
T02TD1363E:168b-45: dpral ba mgrin pa snying ga dang //
T02TD1363E:168b-46: lte ba gtsug tor gsang ba la //
T02TD1363E:168b-48: ham ksha:yi ge rim pas sbyar //
T02TD1363E:168b-49: 'od dpag med dang rin chen dbang //
T02TD1363E:168b-50: de nas don yod rnam snang mdzad //
T02TD1363E:168b-51: mi bskyod pa dang rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD1363E:169a-0: aom hra:sarb'a stva r'a dza m'a ra kle sh'anta ka @169a * //
T02TD1363E:169a-1: ra badzra t'i kshn'a du:khatstshe da ma ma ka ram bi sho dha ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1363E:169a-2: sngags 'di yang dag brjod byas nas //
T02TD1363E:169a-3: lag pa phan tshun nye bar bya //
T02TD1363E:169a-4: aa ai la sogs thung du ni //
T02TD1363E:169a-5: g-yon pa'i mthe'u chung 'og tshigs nas //
T02TD1363E:169a-6: g-yas pa'i mthe bor steng tshigs sogs //
T02TD1363E:169a-7: l'a sogs ring po lnga pa gsum //
T02TD1363E:169a-9: ae ae aa ra ao aal /
T02TD1363E:169a-13: a'a la aoo a'a ra aee a'a /
T02TD1363E:169a-14: l'i a'u r'i a'a zhes pa'o //
T02TD1363E:169a-15: lag pa kha sbyar dbus su ni //
T02TD1363E:169a-16: h'um gi yi ge mchog tu sngo //
T02TD1363E:169a-17: zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan gyi //
T02TD1363E:169a-18: sa bon gyis ni rtse lnga bcing //
T02TD1363E:169a-19: rdo rje'i phyag rgya de yis ni //
T02TD1363E:169a-20: gtsug tor rkang sen mthar thug reg / aom a'a:h'um ho ham ksha:k'a ya w'a ktsi tta dzny'a n'a dhi pa te badzra k'a ya ma ma k'a ya w'aktsi tta dzny'ana badzram badzra k'a ya sva bh'a bam ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1363E:169a-22: de nas nga rgyal bya ste /
T02TD1363E:169a-23: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra k'a ya sva bh'a ba a'atma konya zhes bya'o //
T02TD1363E:169a-24: blo ldan rigs drug rnams bkod nas //
T02TD1363E:169a-25: de nas yan lag drug dgod bya //
T02TD1363E:169a-26: lag gnyis kha sbyar byas nas ni //
T02TD1363E:169a-27: mthe bong zung dag snying gar dgod //
T02TD1363E:169a-28: bsrung ba'i 'khor lo nyer bsdu ba //
T02TD1363E:169a-29: lugs las bzlog pa'i rim pas brjod //
T02TD1363E:169a-30: aom hl'im hri da y'a ya na ma //
T02TD1363E:169a-31: aom h'um shi ra se sv'a h'a /
T02TD1363E:169a-32: aom dhrrim shi kh'a yee boo shat /
T02TD1363E:169a-33: aom hrim ka pa ts'a ya h'um /
T02TD1363E:169a-34: lag gnyis dag gis lus kun la //
T02TD1363E:169a-35: reg cing 'di ni yang dag brjod //
T02TD1363E:169a-36: aom hr'am ne tr'a ya pa shat /
T02TD1363E:169a-38: mdzub mo dang ni mthe bong gi / se gol lag pa g-yon pas bya'o //
T02TD1363E:169a-39: mi dge ba la lag g-yas kyi //
T02TD1363E:169a-40: phyogs kun du yang mtshon cha mchog / de yi 'og tu blo bzangs kyis //
T02TD1363E:169a-41: 'dir yang stong nyid bsgom par bya //
T02TD1363E:169a-42: brtan par byed pa'i sngags rnams kyang //
T02TD1363E:169a-44: rlung sogs dkyil 'khor bsams nas ni //
T02TD1363E:169a-45: steng du de yongs gyur pa las //
T02TD1363E:169a-46: ring du mthong ba'i mtshams kyi mtha' //
T02TD1363E:169a-49: ra ba lnga yang de bzhin no //
T02TD1363E:169a-50: kun gyi 'og tu mdung dang ni //
T02TD1363E:169a-51: steng du mda' yi dra ba'o //
T02TD1363E:169a-52: dbus su rdo rjes gzhi ni //
T02TD1363E:169a-53: yul 'khor mthar yang bsgom par bya //
T02TD1363E:169a-54: tho rangs grib ma'i mtshams kyi mthar //
T02TD1363E:169a-55: khang pa brtsegs pa'o de nang du //
T02TD1363E:169a-57: de dbus nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1363E:169a-58: aom h'am yam r'am w'am lam badzr'a k'a sha b'a yu te dza yu da ka pri thv'i badzra sva bh'a ba panytsa dh'a ta bo badzra mandal'a ni ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1363E:169b-0: @169b zhes pa 'og tu dkyil 'khor dgod pa'i sngags so //
T02TD1363E:169b-1: aom a'a:hum ra:badzra tsandra s'urya r'a hu k'a l'agna ya:k'a ya w'a ktsitta badzra pr'a k'a r'a na ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1363E:169b-2: zhes pa ra ba'i sngags so //
T02TD1363E:169b-3: aom bi shva k'a ya badzra badzra k'u t'a g'a ram ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1363E:169b-4: zhes pa khang pa brtsegs pa'i sngags so //
T02TD1363E:169b-5: aom bi shva badzra padma ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1363E:169b-7: aom ra:badzra s'urya badzra s'ury'a sa nam ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1363E:169b-8: zhes pa nyi ma'i gdan gyi sngags so //
T02TD1363E:169b-9: h'um yig rdo rje las skyes pa'i //
T02TD1363E:169b-10: rdo rje shugs ni gtso bo bzhin //
T02TD1363E:169b-11: dbu ni g-yas 'gying glang lpags gyon //
T02TD1363E:169b-12: nyi shu rtsa drug phyag ldan pa'i //
T02TD1363E:169b-13: khro dbang rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom //
T02TD1363E:169b-14: klu bcu yis ni rgyan du byas //
T02TD1363E:169b-15: ral pa dar dbyangs phyag gdub dang //
T02TD1363E:169b-16: ske rags mgul rgyan rkang gdub rim //
T02TD1363E:169b-17: rgyal ba rnam rgyal zhes bya dang //
T02TD1363E:169b-18: stobs kyi rgyu dang padma zhes //
T02TD1363E:169b-19: gnyis rnams dang po g-yon shes bya //
T02TD1363E:169b-20: nor rgyas bu dang dung skyong dang //
T02TD1363E:169b-21: mtha' yas de bzhin rigs ldan dang //
T02TD1363E:169b-23: ma lus bgegs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams //
T02TD1363E:169b-25: mtha' yas zhing rdul grangs 'das pa'i //
T02TD1363E:169b-26: nyi ma las lhag gzi 'od can //
T02TD1363E:169b-27: bsams nas de snying pad nyi la //
T02TD1363E:169b-28: ha ya ra wa la rnams brtsegs //
T02TD1363E:169b-29: thung du ring pos rab phye ba //
T02TD1363E:169b-30: de rnams bcu ni rtsibs bcur spro //
T02TD1363E:169b-31: ha yig las skyes gtsug tor can //
T02TD1363E:169b-32: rtsa zhal gyi ni snyan g-yon las //
T02TD1363E:169b-33: phyung ste khang brtsegs steng dbus su //
T02TD1363E:169b-34: zla ba 'am nyi mar snang bar bsgom //
T02TD1363E:169b-35: snyan g-yas nas phyung gnod mdzes ni //
T02TD1363E:169b-36: h'a skyes rdo rje sa 'og tu'o //
T02TD1363E:169b-37: bgegs mthar byed pa yi las skyes //
T02TD1363E:169b-38: shangs bug g-yon nas shar du'o //
T02TD1363E:169b-39: shangs bug g-yas nas me mtshams su //
T02TD1363E:169b-40: y'i las byung ba'i dbyug sngon can //
T02TD1363E:169b-41: rri skyes shes rab mthar byed ni //
T02TD1363E:169b-42: g-yon pa'i spyan las lho ru spro //
T02TD1363E:169b-43: rr'i las byung ba'i 'dod rgyal ni //
T02TD1363E:169b-44: g-yas pa'i spyan las bden bral du'o //
T02TD1363E:169b-45: 'dir ni skye ba'i rim nyid kyis //
T02TD1363E:169b-46: dang por gnod sbyin dbang ldan mchog / lhag mchu dang rlung gi phyogs //
T02TD1363E:169b-47: rim pa las ni bzlog pa yin //
T02TD1363E:169b-48: wu yig yongs su gyur las skyes //
T02TD1363E:169b-49: padma mthar byed zhal sgo las //
T02TD1363E:169b-50: w'u yig las byung mi g-yo ba //
T02TD1363E:169b-51: gci ba'i sgo nas nges par skyes //
T02TD1363E:169b-52: bshang lam sgo nas phyung ba ni //
T02TD1363E:169b-53: li yig las skyes gshin rje gshed //
T02TD1363E:170a-2: l'i yig las chen stobs chen te //
T02TD1363E:170a-3: khro bo'i rgyal po 'di rnams kun //
T02TD1363E:170a-4: mi mnyam gzi ldan gtso bo mtshungs //
T02TD1363E:170a-5: ma lus bgegs ni 'joms mdzad cing //
T02TD1363E:170a-6: bdud bzhi zad par mdzad rnams so //
T02TD1363E:170a-7: so sor bsdu ba'i rim nyid kyis //
T02TD1363E:170a-9: / bsams te zad par nam mkha' sogs //
T02TD1363E:170a-10: de ltar sgo rnams las byung spro //
T02TD1363E:170a-11: khang brtsegs steng dang g-yon mdzes drung //
T02TD1363E:170a-12: gzhan ni khang brtsegs phyi rol du //
T02TD1363E:170a-13: stong pa rlung me chu dang sa'i //
T02TD1363E:170a-15: de bzhin gza' dang klu rnams dang //
T02TD1363E:170a-17: / zad par gza' dang 'byung po rnams //
T02TD1363E:170a-18: mtshon cha 'dod ma sogs ji bzhin //
T02TD1363E:170a-19: khro bo phyogs skyong klu rnams kyi //
T02TD1363E:170a-21: klu yis khro bo rnams kyang 'dir //
T02TD1363E:170a-22: zhal gsum phyag drug spyan gsum pa'o //
T02TD1363E:170a-23: 'di kun ming gi rim pa yang //
T02TD1363E:170a-24: gtor ma'i sngags ni ji bzhin no //
T02TD1363E:170a-25: ra ba gsum par phyogs skyong dang //
T02TD1363E:170a-27: phyi rol ra ba lnga rnams la //
T02TD1363E:170a-28: de bzhin klu dang 'byung po spro //
T02TD1363E:170a-29: gha dzha dha bha dha rnams brtsegs //
T02TD1363E:170a-30: phyogs skyong sas bon go rims bzhin //
T02TD1363E:170a-31: ga dza da ba da rnams brtsegs //
T02TD1363E:170a-33: kha tsha tha pha tha rnams brtsegs //
T02TD1363E:170a-34: rim pa ji bzhin klu'i sa bon //
T02TD1363E:170a-35: ka tsa ta pa ta rnams brtsegs //
T02TD1363E:170a-37: ra ba gsum dang ra ba lnga'i //
T02TD1363E:170a-38: phyi dang nang du de bzhin no //
T02TD1363E:170a-39: de dag rnam par gnon byed pa'i //
T02TD1363E:170a-40: steng dang 'og tu gnas pa spro //
T02TD1363E:170a-41: ye shes mkha' rlung me dang chu //
T02TD1363E:170a-42: sa yi khams las yang dag byung //
T02TD1363E:170a-43: srung ba'i 'khor lor gnas pa drug / gnyis gnyis sems dag lus srung ba'o //
T02TD1363E:170a-45: bgegs dang log par 'dren pa bsregs //
T02TD1363E:170a-46: mkha' khyab me stag tshogs 'phro ba'i //
T02TD1363E:170a-48: de nas mnyam par gzhag pa yis //
T02TD1363E:170a-49: bdud sreg pa ni bsgrags par bya //
T02TD1363E:170a-50: aom a'a:h'um ho ham ksha:hra:hra:hra:hra:ra ra ra ra badzra na la sarb'a ba ra na dharma pra la ya sva bh'a ba sarba m'a ra k'a yi ka bighna bi n'a ya k'a d'i n'am da sha digga t'a n'am k'a ya w'a ktsi tt'a ni da ha da ha pa tsa pa tsa bha shm'im ku ru ku ru h'um h'um phat phat /
T02TD1363E:170b-0: ces pa bdud sreg @170b pa'i sngags so //
T02TD1363E:170b-1: bgegs dang log 'dren la sogs rnams //
T02TD1363E:170b-2: rdo rje lcags kyus dbang byas te //
T02TD1363E:170b-3: rdo rje zhags pa yis kyang ni //
T02TD1363E:170b-4: bcing pa lnga yis bcings par bsgom //
T02TD1363E:170b-5: khro dbang rdo rje phur bu ni //
T02TD1363E:170b-6: lte ba'i 'og nas mdung gi tshul //
T02TD1363E:170b-7: phyogs bcu rnams su gdug pa yi //
T02TD1363E:170b-8: steng du bying bar bsam par bya //
T02TD1363E:170b-10: aom a'a:h'um ho ham ksha:h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat badzra k'i la ka k'a ya w'aktsitta dzny'a n'a dhi pa te shadmu kha shadbhu dza sarba tsa ra na sarba bighna bi n'a ya k'a di dusht'a nam k'a ya w'aktsitta dzny'a n'a ni k'i la ya k'i la ya h'um h'um phat phat /
T02TD1363E:170b-11: de nas rdo rje tho ba'i sngags ni /
T02TD1363E:170b-12: aom ll'i:badzra mungga ra m'a r'a d'i n'am shi ra si kanthe hri da ye n'a bhoo gu hya badzra k'i la k'a n'a ko ta ya ksh'am ksh'am kshim ksh'im ksh'im kshr'im ksh'um ksh'um kshli kshl'im h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat /
T02TD1363E:170b-13: de nas blo ldan khro dbang bgi / nga rgyal byas nas phyogs bcu yi //
T02TD1363E:170b-14: phur bu bsrung ba'i khro bo la //
T02TD1363E:170b-15: sngags 'di brjod de bka' bsgo bya //
T02TD1363E:170b-16: aom h'um kro dhendro ham kro dh'a n'a m'u dzny'a d'a ya ka sv'a h'a /
T02TD1363E:170b-17: aom ham badzra kro dha r'a dza ma ho shn'i shordha di shi raksh'am ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1363E:170b-18: aom yam badzra kro dha r'a dza aa ti ba la /
T02TD1363E:170b-19: sarba bighn'anta ka p'u rba di shi raksh'am ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1363E:170b-20: aom ram badzra kro dha r'a dza dzambha ka dushta pradzny'anta ka dakshi na di shi raksh'am ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1363E:170b-21: aom lam badzra kro dha r'a dza stambha ka ya m'anta ka pa shtsi ma di shi raksh'am ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1363E:170b-22: aom wam badzra kro dha r'a dza m'a na ka bi r'a ga padma nta ka au tta ra di shi raksh'am ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1363E:170b-23: aom y'a:badzra kro dha r'a dza n'i la danda aagne yy'am di shi raksh'am ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1363E:170b-24: aom r'a:badzra kro dha r'a dza takki r'a dza nee rri ty'am di shi raksh'a ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1363E:170b-25: aom l'a:badzra kro dha r'a dza ma h'a ba la b'a ya byand'i shi raksh'am ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1363E:170b-26: aom wam:badzra kro dha r'a dza tsa le a'i sh'a na di shi nga ksha'am ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1363E:170b-27: aom h'a:badzra kro dha r'a dza sumbha r'a dza aa dhva di shi raksham ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1363E:170b-28: de nas aom sarba ta th'a ga ta raksha tsakra sv'a bh'a b'atma konya zhes pas brtan par bya'o //
T02TD1363E:170b-29: de nas de rnams la gtor ma /
T02TD1363E:170b-30: sngags tshig rnams kyis rim pas sbyin /
T02TD1363E:170b-32: aushn'i sha sumbha ni sumbha bighn'anta ka n'i la danda ka t'akki ra dza padmanta ka aa tsa la ya m'anta ka ma h'a ba le bhya:sa pa ri w'a re bhya ai dam ba lim gandham pushpam dh'u pam d'i pam aaksha tam da d'a ma he te ts'a ga tya sa pa ri w'a r'a: sh'i ghram ai dam ba lim gri hnantu kha d'antu bi wantu dza:h'um bam ho:sam tript'a:sarba satv'a n'am sh'antim pushtim raksh'a ba ra na guptam kurbantu h'um h'um phat phat badzra dha ra a'a dzny'a pa ya ti sv'a h'a /
T02TD1363E:170b-33: zhes pa khro bo thams cad kyi gtor ma'i sngags so //
T02TD1363E:171a-1: a'a k'a sha w'a yu te dza au da ka pri thv'i s'a dhi te bhya: sa pa ri w'a re zhes pa la sogs pa lhag ma snga ma bzhin te zad par gyi gtor ma'i sngags so //
T02TD1363E:171a-2: aom a'a: h'um ho: bra hma bhishn'u nee rri tya b'a yu y'a m'a gni sa mu dre shv'a re ndra ya kshe bhya:/
T02TD1363E:171a-3: zhes pa la sogs pa phyogs skyong gi gtor ma'i sngags so //
T02TD1363E:171a-4: aom a'a: h'um ho: r'a hu k'a l'a gni tsandra s'u rya buddha mam ga la shu kra pri ha spa ti ke tu sha ne bhya:/
T02TD1363E:171a-5: zhes pa la sogs pa gza'i gtor ma'i sngags so //
T02TD1363E:171a-6: aom a'a: h'um ho: dza ya bi dza ya padma ka rko ta ga b'a su kim sham kh'a p'a la ku li k'a nanta ta ksha ka ma h'a padme bhya:/
T02TD1363E:171a-7: zhes pa la sogs pa klu'i gtor ma'i sngags so //
T02TD1363E:171a-8: aom a'a: h'um ho: be t'a da bi kri ta mu kha shva k'a ka sh'u ka ra gri dhra by'a ghro l'u ka dzambu ga ru da mu khe bhya: sa pa ri zhes pa la sogs pa thams cad snga ma bzhin te 'byung po'i gtor ma'i sngags so //
T02TD1363E:171a-9: gtor ma rgyal mtshan ba dan sogs //
T02TD1363E:171a-10: mchod pa'i rnam pa yang dag ldan //
T02TD1363E:171a-11: med na yid kyis bsgom par bya //
T02TD1363E:171a-12: bza' bca' la sogs rgya che ba //
T02TD1363E:171a-13: shing rta khur dang zangs mo cha //
T02TD1363E:171a-14: thal mo la sogs bar du yang //
T02TD1363E:171a-15: g-yon dang g-yas dang zung gis bkab //
T02TD1363E:171a-16: nam mkha' lding gi phyag rgya dang //
T02TD1363E:171a-17: sku yi rdo rjes sbyang bar bya //
T02TD1363E:171a-18: gsung gi rdo rjes rtogs bya ste //
T02TD1363E:171a-19: thugs kyi rdo rje sbar bar bya //
T02TD1363E:171a-20: ye shes kyi ni bdud rtsi dgug / rtse lnga gri gug ral gri dang //
T02TD1363E:171a-21: rin chen chu skyes 'khor lo yis //
T02TD1363E:171a-22: phyag rgyas de rnams la gtor ma //
T02TD1363E:171a-24: dril bu'i sgra dang bstod pa bya //
T02TD1363E:171a-25: ye shes nam mkha' rlung me chu //
T02TD1363E:171a-26: sa yi rang bzhin de rnams kyang //
T02TD1363E:171a-27: ham aa ai ri au li bsam //
T02TD1363E:171a-28: kra m'a d'a pa rakshe na sa ste //
T02TD1363E:171a-29: 'khor lo drug tu gshegs gsol bya //
T02TD1363E:171a-30: skad cig nyid la dgug bya ste //
T02TD1363E:171a-31: ji skad bstan pa thams cad nyid //
T02TD1363E:171a-32: ces pa gsungs pa'i 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'o //
T02TD1363E:171a-34: 'dod ma'i grogs dang ldan pa yang //
T02TD1363E:171a-35: kha ni dag par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD1363E:171a-36: bdud rtsi ril bu kha ru gzhug / yang na lus dag bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD1363E:171a-37: rdo rje'i phyag rgyas lus reg nas //
T02TD1363E:171a-38: dang por skad cig rnam pa yis //
T02TD1363E:171a-39: dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo'i sku //
T02TD1363E:171a-40: thugs kar pam skyes pad dmar 'dab brgyad pa'am //
T02TD1363E:171a-41: yang na aam skyes sna tshogs padmar ni //
T02TD1363E:171b-0: zla ba nya ba la ni h'um yig @171b sngo ;
T02TD1363E:171b-1: / de las byung ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i //
T02TD1363E:171b-2: gzi brjid las skyes sangs rgyas tshogs rnams ni //
T02TD1363E:171b-3: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1363E:171b-4: sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa'i phyir du yang //
T02TD1363E:171b-5: 'khor lo'i gtso bo rnams kyang bsgom par bya //
T02TD1363E:171b-6: brtsegs pa'i sa bon las byung ba //
T02TD1363E:171b-7: dri chab ma sogs lha mo ni //
T02TD1363E:171b-8: kun nas 'od kyis bkug rnams kyis //
T02TD1363E:171b-9: mngon par phyag 'tshal rab mchod bya //
T02TD1363E:171b-10: aom tstshdzdzhnya badzra gandha gandh'a nam ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1363E:171b-11: aom tstshdzdzhny'a badzra m'a le m'a l'a rtstsa nam ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1363E:171b-12: aom tthddhna badzra dh'u pe dh'u p'a rtstsa nam ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1363E:171b-13: aom tthddhn'a badzra pra d'i pe pra d'i pa rtstsa nam ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1363E:171b-14: aom pphbbhma badzr'a mri te nee bi dya p'u dzam ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1363E:171b-15: aom pphbbhm'a badzra ksha te nyksha ta pha la rtstsa nam ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1363E:171b-16: aom tthddhna badzra l'a sye wa stra bha ra na p'u dzam ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1363E:171b-17: aom tthddhn'a badzra h'a sye ga nd'a darna pu dzam ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1363E:171b-18: aom kkhgghnga badzra w'a dye wa dya p'u dzam ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1363E:171b-19: aom kkhgghng'a badzra nri tye nri tya p'u dzam ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1363E:171b-20: aom spshsh [?] ka badzra g'i te g'i ta p'u dz'am ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1363E:171b-21: aom sapshsh [?] k'a badzra k'a me arba buddha bo dhi satv'a n'am badzra su ra ta p'u dz'im ku ru ku sv'a h'a /
T02TD1363E:171b-22: zhing rdul kun las lhag pa yi //
T02TD1363E:171b-23: rdo rje gsum sbyor rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02TD1363E:171b-24: dam chos dang bcas tshogs rnams la //
T02TD1363E:171b-25: bdag ni gus pas phyag bgyi'o //
T02TD1363E:171b-26: de rnams re re la yang de snyed kyi //
T02TD1363E:171b-27: de la bos pa shin tu yid 'phrog pa //
T02TD1363E:171b-28: dri chab ma sogs lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyis //
T02TD1363E:171b-29: dri bzang la sogs rnams kyis mchod pa bgyi //
T02TD1363E:171b-30: bgyis dang bgyid du stsal dang gzhan rnams la //
T02TD1363E:171b-31: rjes su yid rangs btang snyoms gzhag pa ste //
T02TD1363E:171b-32: srid par lus sogs las skyes nyes pa dang //
T02TD1363E:171b-33: sdig pa ma lus pa dag bshags par bgyi //
T02TD1363E:171b-34: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02TD1363E:171b-35: 'phags pa du mas chos la mchog mdzad dang //
T02TD1363E:171b-36: gzhan gyi dge ba byas pa gang yin la //
T02TD1363E:171b-37: rab tu dga' bas rjes su yi rang ngo //
T02TD1363E:171b-38: mchog gi brtse bas khyab par gyur pa yi //
T02TD1363E:171b-39: kun du chags las ma chags bde ba 'byung //
T02TD1363E:171b-40: thar pa'i thabs ni rab tu sbyin mdzad pa'i //
T02TD1363E:171b-41: sangs rgyas rnams la rtag tu skyabs su 'chi //
T02TD1363E:171b-42: kun du rtog pa ma lus kun nas spangs //
T02TD1363E:172a-1: pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi phun tshogs brten //
T02TD1363E:172a-2: dngos dang dngos med gnyis su med pa'i chos //
T02TD1363E:172a-3: rnam pa gnyis la rab tu skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1363E:172a-4: sangs rgyas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dam pa'i chos //
T02TD1363E:172a-5: dam pa'i yon tan mnga' ba tshogs kyi mchog / chags pa'i zhags pa'i tshogs las nges grol bar //
T02TD1363E:172a-6: 'gyur ba de la nges par skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1363E:172a-7: sems can rnams kyi ci 'dod don //
T02TD1363E:172a-8: bya phyir bdag gi lus 'di ni //
T02TD1363E:172a-9: shin tu rnam par dag sems kyis //
T02TD1363E:172a-10: sangs rgyas rnams la dbul bar bgyi //
T02TD1363E:172a-11: rmongs dang dka' thub kyis bskams pa'i //
T02TD1363E:172a-12: 'gro ba'i lo tog thams cad la //
T02TD1363E:172a-13: dam chos ston pa'i char pa ni //
T02TD1363E:172a-14: rgyal bas rgyun mi 'chad par mdzod //
T02TD1363E:172a-15: ji srid 'khor ba'i brtson ra las //
T02TD1363E:172a-16: ma grol sems can gcig gi bar //
T02TD1363E:172a-17: de srid mya ngan mi 'da' ba'i //
T02TD1363E:172a-18: brtse ba chen po bstan du gsol //
T02TD1363E:172a-19: gal te gzugs can gyur na zhing gi rdul //
T02TD1363E:172a-20: kun dang mnyam pa'i nam mkha'i tshad las kyang //
T02TD1363E:172a-21: lhag par gyur pa'i bsod nams 'di de yang //
T02TD1363E:172a-22: rdzogs pa'i byang chub nyid du bsngo bar bgyi //
T02TD1363E:172a-23: ma lus nyes las nges grol zhing //
T02TD1363E:172a-24: yon tan kun gyis brgyan gyur pa //
T02TD1363E:172a-25: ye shes rgya mtsho rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02TD1363E:172a-26: sems can don phyir 'grub par shog //
T02TD1363E:172a-27: byang chub sems ni bskyed bgyi zhing //
T02TD1363E:172a-28: bsam pa rnam par dag pa bskyed //
T02TD1363E:172a-29: bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa spangs //
T02TD1363E:172a-30: rtsa ba gsum ni dran par bgyi //
T02TD1363E:172a-31: sbyin sogs phyogs dang tshangs gnas bzhi //
T02TD1363E:172a-32: bsdu ba zhi dge ba rnam bcu bsten //
T02TD1363E:172a-33: sgrib pa lnga dang nyon mongs dang //
T02TD1363E:172a-34: de bzhin zag pa bzhi po spang //
T02TD1363E:172a-35: de nas dngos po med la bsgom pa med //
T02TD1363E:172a-36: bsgom pa bsgom pa nyid ma yin //
T02TD1363E:172a-37: de ltar dngos po dngos med pas //
T02TD1363E:172a-38: bsgom pa dmigs su med pa'o //
T02TD1363E:172a-39: stong pa'i rang bzhin stong nyid las //
T02TD1363E:172a-40: kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang skyes //
T02TD1363E:172a-41: de lta na yang kun rdzob tu //
T02TD1363E:172a-42: bsngags pas dkyil 'khor dbang phyug bsgrub //
T02TD1363E:172a-43: ji ltar mthar ni chu yis me //
T02TD1363E:172a-44: 'jig ste sa yang zhu bar gyur //
T02TD1363E:172a-45: chu ni rlung gis sems byed cing //
T02TD1363E:172a-46: rlung ni stong par 'jug par byed //
T02TD1363E:172a-47: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i sems //
T02TD1363E:172a-48: mkha' dbyings yul dang bral gyur pa //
T02TD1363E:172a-49: rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan gzugs //
T02TD1363E:172b-0: dbu ma'i gnas su @172b gzhag par bya //
T02TD1363E:172b-1: de nas aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'ana badzra sa bh'a b'a tma ko& ham aom aa ni mi tta dzny'ana badzra sva bh'a b'a tma ko& ham /
T02TD1363E:172b-2: aom aa pra ni hi ta dzny'ana badzra sva bh'a b'a tma ko& ham /
T02TD1363E:172b-3: aom aa na bhi sam sk'a ra dznya na badzra sva bh'a b'a tma ko& ham /
T02TD1363E:172b-5: ma yi lus la gru gsum mo //
T02TD1363E:172b-6: de dbus brtsegs pa'i sa bon dang ;
T02TD1363E:172b-7: / smon lam bag chags dbang las byung //
T02TD1363E:172b-8: hkshmlwrya de yongs gyur las rlung la sogs //
T02TD1363E:172b-9: rten gyi dkyil 'khor de rnams la //
T02TD1363E:172b-10: thad ka'i tshad ni dpag tshad dag /'bum phrag bzhi gsum gnyis gcig go //
T02TD1363E:172b-11: nag dmar ser dang dkar ba ste //
T02TD1363E:172b-12: sna tshogs rdo rje gnyis kyis mtshan //
T02TD1363E:172b-13: rgyal mtshan bkra shis chu skyes dang //
T02TD1363E:172b-14: rdo rjes kyang ni de rnams mtshan //
T02TD1363E:172b-17: zlum po gru bzhi go ram sa bzhin //
T02TD1363E:172b-18: ma yig las skyes lhun po che //
T02TD1363E:172b-19: rin chen rdo rje'i rang bzhin de //
T02TD1363E:172b-20: 'og la stong phrag bcu drug dang //
T02TD1363E:172b-21: steng la stong phrag lnga bcur brjod //
T02TD1363E:172b-22: de yi phyed du ksha las skyes //
T02TD1363E:172b-23: sna tshogs padma'o ha dang ni //
T02TD1363E:172b-24: zla phyed thig le las skyes pa'i //
T02TD1363E:172b-25: zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan gzugs //
T02TD1363E:172b-26: nang du dpral ba sogs kyang ngo //
T02TD1363E:172b-27: de steng h'um 'phros rdo rje ni //
T02TD1363E:172b-28: 'bar ba'i sa dang gur nang du //
T02TD1363E:172b-29: 'od gsal bhr'um yig las byung ba'i //
T02TD1363E:172b-30: khang pa brtsegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum //
T02TD1363E:172b-31: 'og tu aom skyes dbus kyi ni //
T02TD1363E:172b-34: sum cu rtsa gnyis de zhes bya //
T02TD1363E:172b-35: aom yig ye shes las skyes par //
T02TD1363E:172b-36: zla ba nyi ma'i gdan rnams so //
T02TD1363E:172b-37: phyi rol dag tu bzhon pa'i steng //
T02TD1363E:172b-38: zla ba nyi ma spangs pa yi //
T02TD1363E:172b-39: brgyad dang bcu gnyis grangs rnams so //
T02TD1363E:172b-40: sgo rnams su ni shing rta bzhi //
T02TD1363E:172b-41: sna tshogs nor bu gser sogs kyi //
T02TD1363E:172b-43: mtha' yas sangs rgyas zhing rdul dang //
T02TD1363E:172b-44: mnyam pa'i nyi ma'i 'od dang mtshungs //
T02TD1363E:172b-45: nam mkha' ji srid mthas gtugs par //
T02TD1363E:172b-47: sangs rgyas byang chub lha rdzas gnas //
T02TD1363E:172b-48: rang bzhin dri med shin tu gsal //
T02TD1363E:172b-49: gzhal med bsod nams ye shes kyi //
T02TD1363E:172b-50: tshogs las byung ba'i nor bus brgyan //
T02TD1363E:172b-51: snying po'i 'khor lo'i nor bu'i nang //
T02TD1363E:172b-52: 'di ni kun nas dag pa'i mchog / de nas phyi rol de lus la //
T02TD1363E:172b-53: de khams dag par rgyas par brjod //
T02TD1363E:173a-1: kyi phung po'i dag pa ni //
T02TD1363E:173a-2: rtsa ba'i rgyud bzhin brjod bya ste //
T02TD1363E:173a-3: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun chos //
T02TD1363E:173a-4: thugs gsung sku yi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1363E:173a-5: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi rnams kyis ni //
T02TD1363E:173a-6: rdo rje'i thig le bzhi pa ste //
T02TD1363E:173a-7: dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi rnams kyis //
T02TD1363E:173a-8: kun nas gru bzhi pa nyid do ;
T02TD1363E:173a-9: / yan lag bcu gnyis 'gags pa yis //
T02TD1363E:173a-10: sgo ni bcu gnyis po rnams te //
T02TD1363E:173a-11: de bzhin sa ni bcu gnyis kyis //
T02TD1363E:173a-12: rta babs dag ni mdzes pa rnams //
T02TD1363E:173a-13: 'phags lam yan lag brgyad rnams kyis //
T02TD1363E:173a-14: phyogs brgyad du ni dur khrod rnams //
T02TD1363E:173a-15: stong nyid bcu drug ka ba rnams //
T02TD1363E:173a-16: khams rnams kyis kyang khang pa brtsegs //
T02TD1363E:173a-17: rnam thar brgyad kyis sgo khyud rnams //
T02TD1363E:173a-18: gzugs can yon tan brgyad rnams kyis //
T02TD1363E:173a-19: 'gram rnams dang ni logs rnams nyid //
T02TD1363E:173a-20: thugs gsung sku yi dbye bas so //
T02TD1363E:173a-21: tshul khrims la sogs phung bo lngas //
T02TD1363E:173a-22: kha dog lnga ni rnam sbyangs pa //
T02TD1363E:173a-23: theg pa gsum gyis rab gsum ;
T02TD1363E:173a-24: / dad pa'i dbang po sogs kyis lnga //
T02TD1363E:173a-25: dang sogs stobs rnams dag gis lnga //
T02TD1363E:173a-26: thugs gsung sku yi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1363E:173a-27: ring nge 'dzin dang gzungs rnams kyis //
T02TD1363E:173a-28: dkyil 'khor gsum la kha khyer te //
T02TD1363E:173a-29: pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs pa yis //
T02TD1363E:173a-30: rin chen snam bu rnam par bkra //
T02TD1363E:173a-31: ma 'dres chos ni bco brgyad kyis //
T02TD1363E:173a-32: do shal phyed pa de rnams nyid //
T02TD1363E:173a-33: dbang rnams kyis kyang ba ku l'i //
T02TD1363E:173a-34: dge bas kra ma sh'i rsha'o //
T02TD1363E:173a-35: stong nyid la sogs rnam thar gyis //
T02TD1363E:173a-36: dril bu'i sgras ni gang ba ste //
T02TD1363E:173a-37: rdzu 'phrul rkang pas rgyal mtshan gtams //
T02TD1363E:173a-38: spong bas me long rab tu 'bar //
T02TD1363E:173a-39: byang chub yan lag rnga yab g-yo //
T02TD1363E:173a-40: yan lag dgu yi phreng bas brgyan //
T02TD1363E:173a-41: bsdu ba bzhi po rnams kyis ni //
T02TD1363E:173a-42: zur du sna tshogs rdo rjes brgyan //
T02TD1363E:173a-43: bden pa rin chen bzhi rnams kyis //
T02TD1363E:173a-44: sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams su spras //
T02TD1363E:173a-45: mngon shes lnga yis rtag tu ni //
T02TD1363E:173a-46: zlum skor chen po lnga yis bskor //
T02TD1363E:173a-47: rnam pa kun gyis byang chub spras //
T02TD1363E:173a-48: rdo rje phreng bas legs par bskor //
T02TD1363E:173a-49: bde ba gcig bu'i lcags ri yis //
T02TD1363E:173a-50: de bzhin ye shes rdo rje 'bar //
T02TD1363E:173a-51: shes rab thabs kyi cha yis ni //
T02TD1363E:173a-52: zla ba nyi ma rtag tu shar //
T02TD1363E:173a-53: thugs gsung sku dang yang dag dag / chos kyi 'khor lo bum pa che //
T02TD1363E:173a-54: rnga bo che dang byang chub shing //
T02TD1363E:173b-0: de bzhin @173b yid bzhin nor bu sogs //
T02TD1363E:173b-2: dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings dang ldan //
T02TD1363E:173b-3: phun tshogs kun byed bsgoms nas ni //
T02TD1363E:173b-4: de nas aa sogs ka sogs dgod //
T02TD1363E:173b-6: thung ngu yon tan yan 'phel ring //
T02TD1363E:173b-7: tshes mtha' dag tu aam dang aa //
T02TD1363E:173b-8: aa sogs g-yon skor lugs 'byung ste //
T02TD1363E:173b-9: la sogs de las bzlog pa'o //
T02TD1363E:173b-10: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rnams ni //
T02TD1363E:173b-11: zlar 'gyur zla ba'i rgyu rnams so //
T02TD1363E:173b-12: la sogs wa ya da dha rnams //
T02TD1363E:173b-13: yi ge rnam gnyis rnam gnyis brjod //
T02TD1363E:173b-14: las ta sogs pa ta tsa //
T02TD1363E:173b-15: ka sogs rang rang gnyis brtsegs nas //
T02TD1363E:173b-16: de rnams gcig pa lugs bzlog las //
T02TD1363E:173b-17: da gha ga sogs rim pa'o //
T02TD1363E:173b-18: g-yas skor ba dang zung gis ni //
T02TD1363E:173b-19: brgyad cu nyi ma'o nyi ma'i rgyu //
T02TD1363E:173b-20: gang 'di me long sogs rim las //
T02TD1363E:173b-21: dbyangs yig dang po gsal byed rjes //
T02TD1363E:173b-22: gang 'di skye ba'i rim pa las //
T02TD1363E:173b-23: gsal byed dang po dbyangs rjes su //
T02TD1363E:173b-24: des na nyi ma'i steng gi ni //
T02TD1363E:173b-25: zla bar h'um yig dri za nyid //
T02TD1363E:173b-26: de rnams kyang ni hri: ru 'gyur //
T02TD1363E:173b-27: de yang ham gyur des mtshan pa'i //
T02TD1363E:173b-28: khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag / mthon ka chen po'i 'od ltar gsal //
T02TD1363E:173b-30: ston par sprul pa'i rnal 'byor can //
T02TD1363E:173b-31: dus kyi 'khor lor mngon brjod pa //
T02TD1363E:173b-32: rdo rje'i rgyan dang sku 'od kyis //
T02TD1363E:173b-33: ma lus nam mkha'i khongs khyab pa //
T02TD1363E:173b-34: yan lag bcu gnyis 'gog bdag nyid //
T02TD1363E:173b-35: dus kyi dbugs 'gags las skyes pa'i //
T02TD1363E:173b-36: gtsug rgyan rna cha mgul rgyan dang //
T02TD1363E:173b-37: tshangs skud phyag gdub ske rags dang //
T02TD1363E:173b-38: zhabs gdub rdo rje phreng ba dang //
T02TD1363E:173b-39: thal ba stag lpags na bza' dang //
T02TD1363E:173b-40: sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed dang //
T02TD1363E:173b-41: ral par dpal ldan rdor sems 'dzin //
T02TD1363E:173b-42: dpa' bo mi rus rgyan ldan zhing //
T02TD1363E:173b-43: thod phreng dang ni dar dbyangs can //
T02TD1363E:173b-44: spyan dang phyag dar bcu gnyis te //
T02TD1363E:173b-45: mgrin pa gsum dang zhal bzhi pa //
T02TD1363E:173b-46: nag po mche gtsigs drag po ni ;
T02TD1363E:173b-47: / byams chen rang bzhin las 'khrungs shing //
T02TD1363E:173b-48: g-yas pa dmar po phyag dang bcas //
T02TD1363E:173b-49: dga' ba chen bo'i thugs las 'khrungs //
T02TD1363E:173b-51: btang snyoms che las yang dag byung //
T02TD1363E:173b-52: g-yon zhal dkar po zhi ba ste //
T02TD1363E:173b-53: snying rje chen po las byung ba'o //
T02TD1363E:174a-1: dang g-yas dang cig shos ni //
T02TD1363E:174a-2: sngo dmar dkar ba'i mgrin gsum ldan //
T02TD1363E:174a-3: sku gcig zhabs gnyis phrag pa drug / dam pa'i phyag ni nyi shu bzhi //
T02TD1363E:174a-4: sum brgya drug cu'i tshigs kyis ni //
T02TD1363E:174a-5: sna tshogs gzugs dang ldan pas mdzes //
T02TD1363E:174a-6: g-yas pa'i phrag gsum sngo dmar dkar //
T02TD1363E:174a-7: cig shos kyang ni de bzhin te //
T02TD1363E:174a-8: dpung pa gnyis gnyis cig shos kyang //
T02TD1363E:174a-9: sngo dmar dkar ba'i rnam pa gsum //
T02TD1363E:174a-10: de bzhin phyag ni bzhi bzhi yang //
T02TD1363E:174a-11: sngo dmar dkar ba rnam pa gsum //
T02TD1363E:174a-12: de bzhin phyag sor 'og tshigs nas //
T02TD1363E:174a-13: sngo dang dmar dang dkar ba nyid //
T02TD1363E:174a-14: sor mo kun kyang sor gdub kyis //
T02TD1363E:174a-15: mdzes shing kha dog lnga ldan te //
T02TD1363E:174a-16: mthe bong la sogs rim pa yis //
T02TD1363E:174a-17: ser dkar dmar dang sngo dang ljang //
T02TD1363E:174a-18: nag po'i phyag bzhir rdo rje dang //
T02TD1363E:174a-19: ral gri rtse gsum gri gug 'gyur //
T02TD1363E:174a-20: de bzhin dmar por me mda' dang //
T02TD1363E:174a-21: lcags kyu cang te'u thob nyid //
T02TD1363E:174a-22: dkar po bzhin ni 'khor lo mchog /
T02TD1363E:174a-23: mdung dang dbyug pa dgra sta'o //
T02TD1363E:174a-24: g-yon gyi nag por dril bu mchog //
T02TD1363E:174a-25: phub dang kha tv'am thod pa ste //
T02TD1363E:174a-26: dmar po bzhir ni gzhu dang zhags //
T02TD1363E:174a-27: rin chen dang ni chu skyes dkar //
T02TD1363E:174a-28: dmar por dpal ldan dung me long //
T02TD1363E:174a-29: rdo rje lcags sgrog tshangs pa'i mgo / sna tshogs yum gyis sku la 'khyud //
T02TD1363E:174a-30: dpal ldan aom yig las skyes pa'i //
T02TD1363E:174a-31: padmar zla nyi sgra gcan gzugs //
T02TD1363E:174a-32: steng du bdud dang dbang ldan gyi //
T02TD1363E:174a-33: brang gi mthil la nyi gzhon dang //
T02TD1363E:174a-34: zla 'od ltar gsal zhabs gnyis po //
T02TD1363E:174a-35: g-yas brkyang du ni rol pas bzhugs //
T02TD1363E:174a-36: zhabs g-yas dmar po'i 'og tu ni //
T02TD1363E:174a-37: lag pa bzhi ba'i bdud dmar po //
T02TD1363E:174a-38: gdong gcig me tog mda' lnga dang //
T02TD1363E:174a-39: lcags kyug zhu dang zhags pa 'dzin //
T02TD1363E:174a-40: zhabs dkar 'og tu dbang ldan yang //
T02TD1363E:174a-41: dkar po gdong gcig mig gsum pa //
T02TD1363E:174a-42: lag bzhi rtse gsum da ma ru //
T02TD1363E:174a-43: kha tv'am ga dang thod pa 'dzin //
T02TD1363E:174a-44: dga' ma au ma gdong dman cing //
T02TD1363E:174a-45: kun du 'khrul pa yang dag skyes //
T02TD1363E:174a-46: skra grol gos dang bral gyur pas //
T02TD1363E:174a-47: rang gi rje bo'i rkang mtha' 'dzin //
T02TD1363E:174a-48: gtso bo'i mgul la 'khyud pa yi //
T02TD1363E:174a-49: sna tshogs yum ni gser gyi mdog / gtso bo'i rgyab zhal gtsor gyur lta'i //
T02TD1363E:174a-50: zhal bzhi dang ni phyag brgyad ma //
T02TD1363E:174b-0: g-yas par gri gug @174b zhags pa dang //
T02TD1363E:174b-1: da ma ru dang bgrang phreng ste //
T02TD1363E:174b-2: g-yon par thod pa zhags pa dang //
T02TD1363E:174b-4: spyan gsal bcu gnyis kyis phyug cing //
T02TD1363E:174b-5: rdo rje sems dpa'i cod pan ldan //
T02TD1363E:174b-6: mi 'gyur gnyis med sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1363E:174b-7: gtso bo'i byin pa'i ljon shing steng //
T02TD1363E:174b-8: rang gi byin pa'i 'khri shing dkris //
T02TD1363E:174b-9: g-yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs //
T02TD1363E:174b-10: 'dab ma brgyad la lha mo brgyad //
T02TD1363E:174b-11: phyag brgyad spyan ni bcu gnyis ma //
T02TD1363E:174b-12: nag dmar ser dan dkar mo ni //
T02TD1363E:174b-13: 'bar ba mnyam pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs //
T02TD1363E:174b-14: phyogs bral 'dab mar du ba dang //
T02TD1363E:174b-15: smig rgyu mar me mkha' snang ma //
T02TD1363E:174b-16: phyag rgya lnga sogs rgyan kun gyis //
T02TD1363E:174b-17: gtso mo bzhin du brgyan byas ma //
T02TD1363E:174b-18: rang rang mngon phyogs mgon po'i zhal //
T02TD1363E:174b-19: gtso bor gyur 'dra'i zhal bzhi ldan //
T02TD1363E:174b-20: de phyir mgon po'i zhal mdog gam //
T02TD1363E:174b-21: yang na phyi rol phyogs kyang ngo //
T02TD1363E:174b-22: me sogs phyogs bral rnams kyang ni //
T02TD1363E:174b-23: rim pa ji bzhin shar phyogs bzhin //
T02TD1363E:174b-24: lha dang sku mdog dag kyang 'dir //
T02TD1363E:174b-25: g-yas skor gyis ni brjod pa nyid //
T02TD1363E:174b-26: gzhan du rim pa gzhan nyid dang //
T02TD1363E:174b-27: yang na spro ba'i rim pas so //
T02TD1363E:174b-28: nag po 'bar ma bdug spos dang //
T02TD1363E:174b-29: tsandan kha che gla rtsi ni //
T02TD1363E:174b-30: ga pur bcas snod dril bu dang //
T02TD1363E:174b-31: yongs 'du'i me tog me tog phreng //
T02TD1363E:174b-32: dmar po 'bar ma mar me dang //
T02TD1363E:174b-33: do shal cod pan lag gdub gos //
T02TD1363E:174b-34: ske rags rin chen rna rgyan dang //
T02TD1363E:174b-35: sil sil byed pa'i rkang gdub ldan //
T02TD1363E:174b-36: ser mo 'bar ma'i g-yas su dung //
T02TD1363E:174b-38: cang te'u g-yon dang pi wang rnga //
T02TD1363E:174b-39: khar ba'i rnga dang zangs kyi dung //
T02TD1363E:174b-40: dkar mo 'bar ba'i g-yas su yang //
T02TD1363E:174b-41: 'o ma chu dang sman chang snod //
T02TD1363E:174b-42: g-yon du bdud rtsi grub pa'i ro //
T02TD1363E:174b-44: du ba ma sogs mtshan ma ni //
T02TD1363E:174b-45: rang mdog dang mtshungs rnga yab brgyad //
T02TD1363E:174b-46: 'di dag khro mo'i dbang phyug dang //
T02TD1363E:174b-47: lhan cig pha rol phyin bcur bshad //
T02TD1363E:174b-48: yid bzhin nor bu chos gand'i //
T02TD1363E:174b-49: dpag bsam shing ni grva gsum du'o //
T02TD1363E:174b-50: gtso bo'i padma'i sa las phyi'i //
T02TD1363E:174b-51: dbang ldan du ni chos kyi dung //
T02TD1363E:174b-53: skye bo'i 'jig rten de gzigs nas //
T02TD1363E:174b-54: lus la shin tu dga' ba'i sgras //
T02TD1363E:175a-0: rgyal ba'i tshogs ni rab tu gzhug / skyes bu rig ma'i @175a * //
T02TD1363E:175a-2: phung po khams sogs rab bcug nas //
T02TD1363E:175a-3: ming dang gzugs sogs ngo bo yis //
T02TD1363E:175a-4: mi snang gyur bar rnam par bsgom //
T02TD1363E:175a-5: lha nyid gzugs kyi sku yis ni //
T02TD1363E:175a-6: mi snang gyur par bar snang du //
T02TD1363E:175a-7: phyung bas ji lta ba bzhin du //
T02TD1363E:175a-8: sna tshogs yum la gzhug par bya //
T02TD1363E:175a-9: slar yang de las nges 'thon nas //
T02TD1363E:175a-10: rang gi lus kyi nang du zhugs //
T02TD1363E:175a-11: rdo rje'i lam nas phyung nas ni //
T02TD1363E:175a-12: zla ba zhu ba'i rang bzhin las //
T02TD1363E:175a-13: lha mo'i padmar rang rang gi / sa bon las skyes rdo rje ni //
T02TD1363E:175a-14: rten dang brten pa'i mtshan nyid can //
T02TD1363E:175a-15: mi bskyod dkyil 'khor bsams te dbyung //
T02TD1363E:175a-16: sngon du bcom ldan 'das sku la //
T02TD1363E:175a-17: 'gro la phan pa kun sgrub pa //
T02TD1363E:175a-18: bdag po de bzhin bcug nas ni //
T02TD1363E:175a-19: dkyil 'khor pa rnams yang dag spro //
T02TD1363E:175a-20: bde chen sbyar las phyi rol du //
T02TD1363E:175a-21: rdo rje phreng ba gnyis kyi bar //
T02TD1363E:175a-22: ral gri phreng sogs kyis brgyan pa'i //
T02TD1363E:175a-23: brgyad gnyis ka ba'i bar bar du //
T02TD1363E:175a-24: phyogs kyi padmar rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02TD1363E:175a-25: kun tu gzigs rnams spro bar bya //
T02TD1363E:175a-26: thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug pa //
T02TD1363E:175a-27: rgyan rnams kun gyis yang dag brgyan //
T02TD1363E:175a-28: dam pa'i phyag gis rang nyid la //
T02TD1363E:175a-29: mngon phyogs gzhan rigs shes rab 'khyud //
T02TD1363E:175a-30: pad dkar la gnas nyi ma yi //
T02TD1363E:175a-31: dkyil 'khor la ni skyil krung bzhugs //
T02TD1363E:175a-32: rnam shes kyis mtshan spyi bor ni //
T02TD1363E:175a-33: ral pa'i cod pan dang dbyangs can //
T02TD1363E:175a-34: der ni shar phyogs chu skyes las //
T02TD1363E:175a-35: sems can mtha' yas don byed pa //
T02TD1363E:175a-36: don yod grub pa 'di ni nag / dkar dang nag dang dmar ba'i zhal //
T02TD1363E:175a-37: de rnams ye shes lnga rang bzhin //
T02TD1363E:175a-38: phung sogs dag pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1363E:175a-39: spyan ma dang ni m'a ma k'i //
T02TD1363E:175a-40: sgrol ma gos dkar rim pa bzhin //
T02TD1363E:175a-42: mngon du phyogs pa'i gnas las byung //
T02TD1363E:175a-43: sku mdog phyag mtshan rang bzhin yang //
T02TD1363E:175a-44: rang rig sangs rgyas rnams dang mtshungs //
T02TD1363E:175a-45: ral pa'i cod pan dbye ba gzhan //
T02TD1363E:175a-46: 'di rnams rin chen cod ban can //
T02TD1363E:175a-48: sku mdog nag po rnams kyi g-yas //
T02TD1363E:175a-49: ral gri gri gug rtse gsum ste //
T02TD1363E:175a-50: g-yon na phub thod kha tv'am ga / mdog dmar rnams kyis g-yas pa na //
T02TD1363E:175a-51: mda' dang lcags kyu cang te'u //
T02TD1363E:175a-52: g-yon pa'i phyag gi mthil gsum du //
T02TD1363E:175b-0: gzhu @175b dang zhags pa rin po che //
T02TD1363E:175b-1: ser po rnams kyi phyag g-yas su //
T02TD1363E:175b-2: 'khor lo dbyug pa rdo rje mchog / g-yon phyag gsum du dpal gyi dung //
T02TD1363E:175b-3: lcags sgrog rdo rje dril bu'o //
T02TD1363E:175b-4: dkar po rnams kyi phyag g-yas su //
T02TD1363E:175b-5: tho ba mdung dang rtse gsum ste //
T02TD1363E:175b-6: g-yon du bad dkar 'dab brgyad dang //
T02TD1363E:175b-7: me long dang ni bgrang phreng ngo //
T02TD1363E:175b-8: me yi mtshams nas brtsams byas te //
T02TD1363E:175b-9: chu skyes dmar dang zla dkyil las //
T02TD1363E:175b-10: dpal ldan sgrol ma gos dkar mo //
T02TD1363E:175b-11: spyan dang m'a ma k'i rim bzhin //
T02TD1363E:175b-12: 'di rnams thabs ni rim pa bzhin //
T02TD1363E:175b-13: mngon du phyogs pa'i gnas las byung //
T02TD1363E:175b-14: rnam snang mdzad dang dpag med 'od //
T02TD1363E:175b-15: las kyi rgyal dang rin chen 'byung //
T02TD1363E:175b-16: padma'i gdan bzhugs te rnams kyang //
T02TD1363E:175b-17: khams sogs dag pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1363E:175b-18: sangs rgyas lha mo gnyis bar du //
T02TD1363E:175b-19: re mig brgyad la pad dmar steng //
T02TD1363E:175b-20: bdud rtsis gang ba'i bum pa'am //
T02TD1363E:175b-21: yang na padma'i snod rnams so //
T02TD1363E:175b-22: shar phyogs sgor ni shin tu stobs //
T02TD1363E:175b-23: rmugs byed rengs byed khengs byed rnams //
T02TD1363E:175b-24: khro mo gzhan ni thob pa la //
T02TD1363E:175b-25: de bzhin kho nar rol bar mdzad //
T02TD1363E:175b-26: phan tshun gzhan rigs las skyes phyir //
T02TD1363E:175b-27: khro bo dang ni khro mo nyid //
T02TD1363E:175b-28: khro bo'i rgyal po thams cad la //
T02TD1363E:175b-29: mngon du phyogs pa phyag rgyar 'gyur //
T02TD1363E:175b-30: rengs byed ma dang khengs byed ma //
T02TD1363E:175b-31: shin tu stobs ma zhes bya dang //
T02TD1363E:175b-32: rmugs byed ma rnams btsun mo nyid //
T02TD1363E:175b-33: chu skyes dkar dang snang byed la //
T02TD1363E:175b-34: g-yas brkyang ba yi stabs kyis gnas //
T02TD1363E:175b-35: mngal du zla ba bzhi pa la //
T02TD1363E:175b-36: ming gzugs 'byung ba'i skad cig go //
T02TD1363E:175b-37: 'byung ba bzhi las byung ba'i gzugs //
T02TD1363E:175b-38: de skyed khro bo lhag ma rnams //
T02TD1363E:175b-39: dbang po drug ni 'byung ba la //
T02TD1363E:175b-40: mkha' lding la sogs yang dag spro //
T02TD1363E:175b-41: shar sogs sgo las byung ba yi //
T02TD1363E:175b-42: g-yas su ra ba'i rtsig pa la //
T02TD1363E:175b-43: snam bur dbang por legs dag pa //
T02TD1363E:175b-44: mkha' snying sa yi snying po dang //
T02TD1363E:175b-45: rnam sel 'jig rten mgon zhes bya //
T02TD1363E:175b-46: byang chub sems ma phyogs bral du //
T02TD1363E:175b-47: reg bya ro dri gzugs rdo rje //
T02TD1363E:175b-48: ma rnams yul dag pa las skyes //
T02TD1363E:175b-49: shar sogs sgo yi g-yon rnams su //
T02TD1363E:175b-50: kun bzang dang ni rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD1363E:175b-52: steng dang 'og tu 'gyur ba gzhag / chos dbyings ma dang sgra ma ste //
T02TD1363E:176a-1: rab dag / ye shes rnam shes las skyes pa //
T02TD1363E:176a-2: de bzhin sngon po ljang gu'o //
T02TD1363E:176a-3: 'di kun g-yas su rim pa yis //
T02TD1363E:176a-4: rdo rje gri gug dgra sta ste //
T02TD1363E:176a-5: g-yon pa rnams su dril bu dang //
T02TD1363E:176a-6: thod pa dang ni tshangs mgo bshad //
T02TD1363E:176a-7: 'di kun g-yas dang cig shos zhal //
T02TD1363E:176a-8: dus gyi [*kyi] 'khor lo bzhin zhes bshad //
T02TD1363E:176a-9: sngon po rnams ni nag po bzhin //
T02TD1363E:176a-10: ljang gu rnams kyi ser po bzhin //
T02TD1363E:176a-11: ji skad bshad pa'i gnas nyid du //
T02TD1363E:176a-13: skye ba'i gnas kyang gzhan dag tu //
T02TD1363E:176a-14: gzhan du ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin //
T02TD1363E:176a-15: kha khyer la ni shar g-yas dang //
T02TD1363E:176a-16: g-yon du dri dang phreng ba gnyis //
T02TD1363E:176a-17: gshin rjer bdug spos mar me ma //
T02TD1363E:176a-18: nub tu sgeg mo bzhad ma nyid //
T02TD1363E:176a-19: lha bshos dpal ldan bdud rtsi yi //
T02TD1363E:176a-21: steng du sgra ma gar mkhan ma //
T02TD1363E:176a-23: de yis bar bar mtha' yas pa'i //
T02TD1363E:176a-24: gzung ba'i mtshan ma brjod bya ste //
T02TD1363E:176a-25: dung chos phreng ba spos phor dang //
T02TD1363E:176a-26: mar me dar dpyangs do shal dang //
T02TD1363E:176a-27: zan snod bdud rtsi'i 'bras sil snyan //
T02TD1363E:176a-28: gos dang rdo rje mtsho skyes rnams //
T02TD1363E:176a-29: res 'ga' du ba ma la sogs //
T02TD1363E:176a-30: lha mo brgyad dang bum pa brgyad //
T02TD1363E:176a-31: yid bzhin nor bu la sogs bzhi //
T02TD1363E:176a-32: dor nas thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD1363E:176a-33: dpal ldan 'dus pa lta bu nyid //
T02TD1363E:176a-34: lha ni nyi shu rtsa lnga pa //
T02TD1363E:176a-35: 'di yang rang sems nus pa dag / shes nas rnal 'byor pas bsgom bya //
T02TD1363E:176a-36: gang tshe sems mchog lhan cig skyes //
T02TD1363E:176a-37: rdo rje sems dpa' snying por gyur //
T02TD1363E:176a-38: de tshe mgon po bzhugs pa la'ang //
T02TD1363E:176a-39: ris ni med pa nyid kyis skyon //
T02TD1363E:176a-40: med ces thub pa chen pos gsungs //
T02TD1363E:176a-41: yang na dbang gi don du yang //
T02TD1363E:176a-43: 'dir ni khro rgyal gtsug tor dang //
T02TD1363E:176a-44: gnod mdzes kyi ni rgyal po dag / steng 'og dag tu gnas pa'ang bya //
T02TD1363E:176a-45: zla ba drug gis ma rig sogs //
T02TD1363E:176a-46: drug ni reg pa'i yan lag par //
T02TD1363E:176a-47: bdun par tshor bar skye ba la //
T02TD1363E:176a-48: dbu ma'i dkyil 'khor spro bar bya //
T02TD1363E:176a-49: de la sprul pa'i 'khor lor ni //
T02TD1363E:176a-50: chu tshod drug cu'i rang bzhin gnas //
T02TD1363E:176a-51: shar sogs phyogs su tsa rtsi k'a //
T02TD1363E:176a-52: la sogs rdo rje'i ming thogs ldan //
T02TD1363E:176a-53: sna tshogs zhal dang rgyan bzang can //
T02TD1363E:176a-54: spyan gsum ldan zhing phyag bzhi ma //
T02TD1363E:176b-0: @176b dbang po tshangs pa dbang phyug dang //
T02TD1363E:176b-1: glang po'i gdong dang lha min dang //
T02TD1363E:176b-2: khyab 'jug mthar byed sped byed rnams //
T02TD1363E:176b-3: gzhan rigs thabs la 'di dag ni //
T02TD1363E:176b-4: lag pa yis ni kun du 'khyud //
T02TD1363E:176b-5: yi dags dmar dang mkha' 'gro'i dbang //
T02TD1363E:176b-6: ma he ltos 'gro za ba dang //
T02TD1363E:176b-7: glang po dang pa khyu mchog dang ;
T02TD1363E:176b-8: / seng ge'i rgyab tu padma brgyad //
T02TD1363E:176b-9: rang rang phyogs su nges gsal ba //
T02TD1363E:176b-10: phyogs dang phyogs bral dmar dang dkar //
T02TD1363E:176b-11: padma'i lte bar zla nyi bral //
T02TD1363E:176b-12: sa ga'i stabs kyis gnas pa la //
T02TD1363E:176b-13: kha dog mtshungs pa'i mtshan nyid can //
T02TD1363E:176b-14: lha mo'i tshogs rnams brgyad brgyad kyi //
T02TD1363E:176b-15: 'dab mar rol pa'i stabs kyis bskor //
T02TD1363E:176b-16: tsa rtsi k'a ni gri gug dang //
T02TD1363E:176b-17: mdung dang thod pa kha tv'am 'dzin //
T02TD1363E:176b-19: dbyug pa padma dung gis mtshan //
T02TD1363E:176b-20: phag mo'i mtshon cha dbyug pa mchog / ral gri dang ni lcags sgrog phub //
T02TD1363E:176b-21: gzhon nu ma ni lha rdzas mdung //
T02TD1363E:176b-22: lcags kyu zhags pa nor bus mtshan //
T02TD1363E:176b-23: rdo rje dbang mo rdo rje dang //
T02TD1363E:176b-25: tshangs ma lag par chu skyes dang //
T02TD1363E:176b-26: tshangs dbyug spyi blugs lhung bzed 'dzin //
T02TD1363E:176b-27: drag mo rtse gsum ta ma ru //
T02TD1363E:176b-28: kha tv'am ga dang sprul gyis mtshan //
T02TD1363E:176b-29: dpal chen mo ni padma dang //
T02TD1363E:176b-30: bgrang phreng chu skyes rin chen mtshan //
T02TD1363E:176b-31: de nas de 'dab lha mo yi //
T02TD1363E:176b-32: ming gi phreng ba bshad par bya //
T02TD1363E:176b-33: 'jigs ma drag mo dus kyi ni //
T02TD1363E:176b-34: mche ba ma dang me 'bar gdong //
T02TD1363E:176b-35: rlung gi shugs ma rab gtum ma //
T02TD1363E:176b-36: spyan drangs ma dang sna chen ma'o //
T02TD1363E:176b-38: dpal mo sgyu ma drag ma dang //
T02TD1363E:176b-39: bkra shis ma dang rnam rgyal ma //
T02TD1363E:176b-40: dpal rgyal dpal rgyal byed ma dang //
T02TD1363E:176b-42: phag mo'i 'dab mar keng rus ma //
T02TD1363E:176b-43: dus mtshan ma dang khros ma dang //
T02TD1363E:176b-44: dus kyi lce ma gtsigs ma dang //
T02TD1363E:176b-45: nag mo drag mo gzugs ngan ma'o //
T02TD1363E:176b-46: padma lus med gzhon nu ma //
T02TD1363E:176b-47: ri dags bdag pos 'gro ma dang //
T02TD1363E:176b-48: rin chen phreng ma mig bzang ma //
T02TD1363E:176b-49: rus ma brgyad pa bzang mo'o //
T02TD1363E:176b-50: rdo rje 'od dang rdo rje lus //
T02TD1363E:176b-51: gser ldan ma dang au rba ste //
T02TD1363E:176b-52: bkra ba'i ri mo rab 'bar grags //
T02TD1363E:176b-53: zug rngu med ma legs sgrol ma'o //
T02TD1363E:176b-54: rig byed 'don ma padma'i mig / chu skyes ldan ma blo ma dang //
T02TD1363E:177a-2: de bzhin glog ma dran ma'o //
T02TD1363E:177a-3: gang du drag mo gtsor gyur der //
T02TD1363E:177a-4: dkar mo gangg'a rtag ma dang //
T02TD1363E:177a-5: myur ma dang ni 'degs ma dang //
T02TD1363E:177a-6: mtshon byed dmar ser nag ma'o //
T02TD1363E:177a-7: dpal ldan dkar mo zla ris ma //
T02TD1363E:177a-8: zla zhal ma dang dang pa'i mdog /'dzin ma padma'i dbang mo dang ;
T02TD1363E:177a-9: / skar mig dri med ri bong 'dzin //
T02TD1363E:177a-10: sum cu rtsa drug grangs mnyam pa'i //
T02TD1363E:177a-12: gsung sku'i dkyil 'khor kha khyer la //
T02TD1363E:177a-13: zhal gcig rang rang phyogs gsal byed //
T02TD1363E:177a-14: phyogs cha re re rnam pa dgu //
T02TD1363E:177a-15: rol pa'i stabs kyis legs par bzhugs //
T02TD1363E:177a-16: shar du ral gri phub 'dzin te //
T02TD1363E:177a-17: gshin rjer mda' dang gzhu 'dzin rnams //
T02TD1363E:177a-20: steng dang 'og gi rigs gnyis ni //
T02TD1363E:177a-21: lag na gri gug thod pa 'dod //
T02TD1363E:177a-22: gsod dang bskyed par 'dod ma ni //
T02TD1363E:177a-23: rta babs rtsa ba'am steng 'og tu'o //
T02TD1363E:177a-24: 'di rnams gang gis bskyed pa ni //
T02TD1363E:177a-25: rgyas par dogs pas ma bshad do //
T02TD1363E:177a-26: zla ba brgyad pa sreg pa yi //
T02TD1363E:177a-27: yan lag sku yi dkyil 'khor spro //
T02TD1363E:177a-28: las dang bya ba'i 'khor lo yi //
T02TD1363E:177a-29: rtsa rnams rnam par dag pa dang //
T02TD1363E:177a-30: nag sogs zla ba dag pa las //
T02TD1363E:177a-31: der ni lha rnams bcu gnyis 'gyur //
T02TD1363E:177a-32: rdo rje dang po'i ming ldan pa //
T02TD1363E:177a-33: sngar bzhin yang dag ye shes sbyong //
T02TD1363E:177a-34: shar sgo'i g-yas nas brtsams byas te //
T02TD1363E:177a-35: de rnams mkha' snying la sogs bzhin //
T02TD1363E:177a-36: sgra dang sgo yi ngos rnams su'o //
T02TD1363E:177a-37: sgo rnams su ni rang rang gi / bzhon pa'i rgyab gnas sgo skyod rnams //
T02TD1363E:177a-38: phyogs dang phyogs bral dmar dang dkar //
T02TD1363E:177a-40: / zla nyi bral ba'i 'dam skyes la //
T02TD1363E:177a-41: rdo rje'i gdan bzhugs rang phyogs mdog / gnyis med shes rab la mngon phyogs //
T02TD1363E:177a-42: 'dab ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad la //
T02TD1363E:177a-43: rol pa'i rkang stabs kyis gnas pa //
T02TD1363E:177a-44: kun kyang phyag bzhi kha dog dang //
T02TD1363E:177a-45: mtshan ma mtshungs pa'i lha mos bskor //
T02TD1363E:177a-46: yi dags dmar po bden bral nag / ral gri gri gug phub thod 'dzin //
T02TD1363E:177a-47: ri dags la ni rlung gi lha //
T02TD1363E:177a-48: ljon shing dbang po'i me tog dang //
T02TD1363E:177a-50: ma he'i padmar gshin rje dbyug / ral gri lcags sgrog zhags pa 'dzin //
T02TD1363E:177a-51: ra yi padmar me lha mdung //
T02TD1363E:177b-0: @177b gdong drug shakti mdung rin chen //
T02TD1363E:177b-1: me long ldan par rma byar gnas //
T02TD1363E:177b-2: glang po'i padmar gnod sbyin ni //
T02TD1363E:177b-3: rin po che dang be con dang //
T02TD1363E:177b-5: dbang po sa srung bu la gnas //
T02TD1363E:177b-6: rdo rje dril bu mda' gzhu 'dzin //
T02TD1363E:177b-7: dang pa'i padmar tshangs pa khab //
T02TD1363E:177b-8: bgrang phreng chu skyes spyi blugs can ;
T02TD1363E:177b-9: / glang gi padmar drag po ni //
T02TD1363E:177b-10: mdung dang mda' dang sbrul gzhu 'dzin //
T02TD1363E:177b-11: chu srin padmar rgya mtsho ni //
T02TD1363E:177b-12: zhags pa rin chen ngos gnyis ldan //
T02TD1363E:177b-13: byi ba'i padmar tshogs bdag ni //
T02TD1363E:177b-14: dgra sta mchog gi rdo rje dang //
T02TD1363E:177b-15: zhags pa dang ni rin chen ldan //
T02TD1363E:177b-16: mkha' 'gro dbang po la gnas pa'i //
T02TD1363E:177b-18: chu skyes skye ba lnga dung 'dzin //
T02TD1363E:177b-19: mchog sde'i don dang rjes mthun par //
T02TD1363E:177b-21: srin mo dang ni rab gtum ma //
T02TD1363E:177b-22: gshin rje ma dang chu lha mo //
T02TD1363E:177b-23: dpal chen nor dbang rlung lha mo //
T02TD1363E:177b-24: glog ma dkar mo phag mo dang //
T02TD1363E:177b-25: gzhon nu ma dang dpal mo rnams //
T02TD1363E:177b-27: khyab 'jug dang ni mthar byed dang //
T02TD1363E:177b-28: 'phrog byed dang ni nor dbang dag / rim bzhin ljang dang sngon po'o //
T02TD1363E:177b-29: steng dang 'og gi rigs nyid kyis //
T02TD1363E:177b-30: der ma yang na 'dod pas brjod //
T02TD1363E:177b-31: ma bshang phyag rgya'i gzugs rnams kyang //
T02TD1363E:177b-32: ji skad bshad pa'i ming nyid kyis //
T02TD1363E:177b-33: mngon phyogs phyag rgya rnams kyi yang //
T02TD1363E:177b-34: mtshon cha gzhan rigs nyid du 'dod //
T02TD1363E:177b-35: 'dab ma'i lha mo de rnams kyis //
T02TD1363E:177b-36: ming ni sa bon mtha' rdo rje //
T02TD1363E:177b-37: bzhi brgyad mi gdags 'dab mar ni //
T02TD1363E:177b-39: lag pa rkang pa'i mthil gtsug tor //
T02TD1363E:177b-40: bshang lam rtsa yi rang bzhin las //
T02TD1363E:177b-41: drug drug sgo ba'i khro bo dang //
T02TD1363E:177b-42: de yi lha mo yang dag spro //
T02TD1363E:177b-43: lha bdag phyogs su dbyug sngon can //
T02TD1363E:177b-44: ral gri rdo rje phub sprul ldan //
T02TD1363E:177b-45: gshin rje'i phyogs su 'dod pa'i rgyal //
T02TD1363E:177b-46: mda' dang lcags kyu gzhu zhags ldan //
T02TD1363E:177b-47: stobs chen 'khor lo dbyug pa dung //
T02TD1363E:177b-48: rin chen ldan pa chu bdag tu'o //
T02TD1363E:177b-49: mi g-yo tho ba mdung padma //
T02TD1363E:177b-50: me long ldan pa nor sbyin du //
T02TD1363E:177b-51: gtsug tor can ni dgra sta dang //
T02TD1363E:177b-52: rtse gsum sbrul zhags kha tv'am ldan //
T02TD1363E:177b-53: gnod mdzes phyag bzhi gri gug dang //
T02TD1363E:177b-54: rdo rje thod pa dril bu ldan //
T02TD1363E:178a-2: rang rang shes rab shing rtar gnas //
T02TD1363E:178a-3: phag rta glang po gdong lnga pa //
T02TD1363E:178a-4: bdun gyi grangs dang ldan pas drangs //
T02TD1363E:178a-5: phyogs kyi mdog dang lhan cig pa //
T02TD1363E:178a-6: steng dang 'og gi shing rta yang //
T02TD1363E:178a-7: ljang gu dang ni sngon po ste //
T02TD1363E:178a-8: grangs bdun mkha' lding aa ni la //
T02TD1363E:178a-9: seng ge rkang pa brgyad pas drangs /
T02TD1363E:178a-10: de rnams kyi ni shes rab kyang //
T02TD1363E:178a-11: 'od zer can dang skul byed ma //
T02TD1363E:178a-12: dpal ldan rdo rje lu gu rgyud //
T02TD1363E:178a-13: khro gnyer can dang shin tu sngo //
T02TD1363E:178a-14: drag can ma rnams gzhan gyi rigs //
T02TD1363E:178a-15: zla ba dgu par len pa la //
T02TD1363E:178a-16: sor mo nyi shu'i rtsa rnams ni //
T02TD1363E:178a-17: rnam dag klu dbang bcu rnams dang //
T02TD1363E:178a-18: rab gtum ma rnams yang dag spro //
T02TD1363E:178a-19: rta babs ka ba'i rtsa rnams su //
T02TD1363E:178a-20: re mig zung bzhir klu rnams te //
T02TD1363E:178a-21: rlung me sa chur bum pa dang //
T02TD1363E:178a-22: rdo rje padma rin chen ldan //
T02TD1363E:178a-23: shar du padma stobs rgyu dag / gshin rjer nor rgyas dung skyong dag / nub tu 'jog po pad chen te //
T02TD1363E:178a-24: byang du rigs ldan mtha' yas so //
T02TD1363E:178a-25: klu dbang rgyal ba rnam rgyal zhes //
T02TD1363E:178a-27: mkha' dang ye shes dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD1363E:178a-28: rnal 'byor dbang pos bsgom par bya //
T02TD1363E:178a-29: mgo bo rnams ni gdengs kas bkab //
T02TD1363E:178a-30: rang rang phyogs kyi mdog dang ldan //
T02TD1363E:178a-31: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste //
T02TD1363E:178a-32: thams cad rdo rje'i gdan gyis gnas //
T02TD1363E:178a-33: dam pa'i bde slad khyi gdong ma //
T02TD1363E:178a-34: la sogs rab gtum phyag rgyar 'gyur //
T02TD1363E:178a-36: thabs kyi tshul ni ji lta bar //
T02TD1363E:178a-37: zhal gcig phyag gnyis phyag rgyal lnga //
T02TD1363E:178a-38: ldan zhing mi mgo'i phreng ba can //
T02TD1363E:178a-39: lus la mi rus phreng ba dang //
T02TD1363E:178a-40: thod pa'i phreng ba dar dbyangs ldan //
T02TD1363E:178a-41: gos dang ldan zhing skra grol ma //
T02TD1363E:178a-42: gri gug dang ni thod pa 'dzin //
T02TD1363E:178a-43: rang gi bzhon pa'i steng rnams su //
T02TD1363E:178a-44: 'khor lor zlum po'i stabs kyis gnas //
T02TD1363E:178a-45: me rlung 'khor yug bar gyi ni //
T02TD1363E:178a-46: dur khrod du ni bzhon pa rnams //
T02TD1363E:178a-47: shar du bse dang ma mtshams su //
T02TD1363E:178a-48: bhe runda dang lho ru dom //
T02TD1363E:178a-49: bden bral khrung khrung nub phyogs su //
T02TD1363E:178a-50: seng ge rlung du mig sngon po //
T02TD1363E:178a-51: nor bdag phyogs su 'bri dang ni //
T02TD1363E:178a-52: dbang ldan du ni bshang lam gdong //
T02TD1363E:178a-53: mdung gis 'bigs par khyi gdong ma //
T02TD1363E:178a-54: lhag ma za bar khra gdong ma //
T02TD1363E:178a-55: ro bsregs par ni phag gdong ma //
T02TD1363E:178a-56: drag po'i g-yul du bya rgod gdong //
T02TD1363E:178b-0: @178b ce sbyang gdong ma rnag gi drir //
T02TD1363E:178b-1: sbrul gyis zos par mkha' lding gdong //
T02TD1363E:178b-2: rus pa bcas par stag gdong ma //
T02TD1363E:178b-3: byis pa shi bar lug gdong ma //
T02TD1363E:178b-4: sngon mo rdo rje mig ma dag / kun gyi steng gi nam mkha' dang //
T02TD1363E:178b-6: aa ni la dang rkang brgyad pa'i //
T02TD1363E:178b-7: shing rtar gnas pa bsgom par bya //
T02TD1363E:178b-8: kun nas rlung gi khor yug mthar //
T02TD1363E:178b-9: zhal mdog mtshon cha sna tshogs pa'i //
T02TD1363E:178b-10: 'byung po bye ba phyed dang bzhi'i //
T02TD1363E:178b-11: tshogs rnams sgrub pa po yis bsgom //
T02TD1363E:178b-12: de ltar dpal ldan dus 'khor zhes //
T02TD1363E:178b-13: bsams nas dkyil 'khor gsum nang du //
T02TD1363E:178b-14: 'gro drug gnas pa'i sems can rnams //
T02TD1363E:178b-15: gsang mchog dkyil 'khor du bkug nas //
T02TD1363E:178b-16: rnam par snang mdzad sogs sangs rgyas //
T02TD1363E:178b-17: khams dang bcas pa snying gar gzhug / byang chub sems su zhu gyur pa //
T02TD1363E:178b-18: rdo rje nas ni yang dag spro //
T02TD1363E:178b-19: byang chub sems des dbang bskur bar //
T02TD1363E:178b-20: bsams te reg pa'i skad cig der //
T02TD1363E:178b-21: zhu ba'i sa bon sogs ngo bos //
T02TD1363E:178b-22: zhal mdog mtshon cha sna tshogs pa //
T02TD1363E:178b-23: lha yi gzugs kyi sku yis ni //
T02TD1363E:178b-24: shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid can //
T02TD1363E:178b-25: dga' chen bde bas gang gyur pa //
T02TD1363E:178b-26: rang lus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid gyur //
T02TD1363E:178b-27: gang phyir gsal byed sna tshogs pa //
T02TD1363E:178b-28: sa bon dbyangs dang ldan rnams te //
T02TD1363E:178b-29: gsal byed ma lus bdag nyid can //
T02TD1363E:178b-30: so sor bsdu ba'i tshul las ksha //
T02TD1363E:178b-31: sum cu rtsa gnyis dbyangs ldan pa //
T02TD1363E:178b-32: de ni sa bon rnams su 'gyur //
T02TD1363E:178b-35: ksha kshe ksha ra ksho ksha la ksham /
T02TD1363E:178b-36: ksh'a kshee ksha ra kshoo ksh'a la ksh'a /
T02TD1363E:178b-39: phung po khams dbang yul rnams dang //
T02TD1363E:178b-40: las dbang dang ni bya ba rnams //
T02TD1363E:178b-41: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan du gyur //
T02TD1363E:178b-42: rtsa ba'i rgyud las ji skad du //
T02TD1363E:178b-43: sangs rgyas zhing na sems can gang //
T02TD1363E:178b-44: sku gsum dam tshig bdud rtsi yis //
T02TD1363E:178b-45: bskyed cing rdo rje'i dpal gyis reg / thams cad der ni de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1363E:178b-46: rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes 'thob //
T02TD1363E:178b-47: 'dir ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gyur //
T02TD1363E:178b-48: bsgoms te de nas de dag rnams //
T02TD1363E:178b-49: rang rang zhing du rab tu gzhug / ces gsungs so //
T02TD1363E:178b-50: srid pa'i yan lag srog spro ba //
T02TD1363E:178b-51: rdo rje'i gsung bskyed btsa' ba brjod //
T02TD1363E:178b-52: gtsug tor dang ni lte ba ho: //
T02TD1363E:178b-53: dpral mgrin snying gar aom a'a: h'um //
T02TD1363E:179a-0: @179a * // lte ba'i ho: yig 'od rnams kyis //
T02TD1363E:179a-1: dpal ldan bde chen padma ru //
T02TD1363E:179a-2: shes rab dang bcas rdo rje can //
T02TD1363E:179a-3: shes rab chags pas khu bar zhu //
T02TD1363E:179a-4: de mthong yid mi bde ba yis //
T02TD1363E:179a-5: sgrol ma la sogs shas cher brtson //
T02TD1363E:179a-6: byams sogs mchog gi rang bzhin can //
T02TD1363E:179a-8: snyan pa'i dbyangs kyis stod byed cing //
T02TD1363E:179a-9: ston pa la ni glu dag mdzad //
T02TD1363E:179a-10: spyan ma bdag ni 'gro ba'i yum //
T02TD1363E:179a-11: rnal 'byor pa yi rgyu mthun gnas //
T02TD1363E:179a-12: bdag gi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD1363E:179a-14: m'a ma k'i bdag sring mo ste //
T02TD1363E:179a-15: rnal 'byor ba yi rnam smin gnas //
T02TD1363E:179a-16: bdag gi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD1363E:179a-18: gos dkar mo bdag bu mo kye //
T02TD1363E:179a-19: rnal 'byor pa yi skyes bur gnas //
T02TD1363E:179a-20: bdag gi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD1363E:179a-22: sgrol ma bdag ni tsha mo ste //
T02TD1363E:179a-23: rnal 'byor pa yi dri bral gnas //
T02TD1363E:179a-24: bdag gi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD1363E:179a-26: stong pa'i dkyil 'khor nyams myong nas //
T02TD1363E:179a-27: 'gro ba gdon pa'i bsam pa yis //
T02TD1363E:179a-28: sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD1363E:179a-29: 'gro ba'i mgon pos spro bar mdzod //
T02TD1363E:179a-31: sgrol ma byams pa'i rang bzhin te //
T02TD1363E:179a-32: m'a ma k'i ni brtse ba'i sku //
T02TD1363E:179a-33: gos dkar dga' ba'i rang bzhin te //
T02TD1363E:179a-34: spyan ma btang snyoms sku can no //
T02TD1363E:179a-35: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma //
T02TD1363E:179a-36: thams cad la ni khyab bdag nyid //
T02TD1363E:179a-37: rim pas spyan ma la sogs glu //
T02TD1363E:179a-38: rgyu mthun 'bras sogs rim pa ste //
T02TD1363E:179a-39: thugs sku gsung dang ye shes bdag / rdo rje glu yis bskul gyur pa //
T02TD1363E:179a-40: de gsan nas ni srid pa gsum //
T02TD1363E:179a-41: mig 'phrul lta bur gzigs gyur nas //
T02TD1363E:179a-42: sngar bzhin sa bon sogs ngo bos //
T02TD1363E:179a-43: khyab bdag rdzogs par bsdom bya ste //
T02TD1363E:179a-44: dkyil 'khor spro ba'ang de bzhin no //
T02TD1363E:179a-45: zla ba bcu bar mnga' bcas pa //
T02TD1363E:179a-46: rnam lnga mngon par rdzogs byang chub //
T02TD1363E:179a-47: sku bskyed pa yi mtshan nyid can //
T02TD1363E:179a-48: bsnyen pa'i yan lag dang po 'di //
T02TD1363E:179a-49: phyis kyang de ltar bsgom par bya //
T02TD1363E:179a-50: aom su bi shuddha dharma dh'a tu sva bh'a watma ko& ham /
T02TD1363E:179a-51: bsnyen pa'i yan lag gnyis pa ni //
T02TD1363E:179a-52: gsung bskyed pa yi rgyu las 'gyur //
T02TD1363E:179a-53: ho yig gnyis kyi bar gnas pa'i //
T02TD1363E:179a-54: yi ge sum ni sngar bzhin dgod //
T02TD1363E:179a-55: sku gsung thugs las yang dag byung //
T02TD1363E:179b-0: zla nyi sgra @179b gcan mtshan nyid can //
T02TD1363E:179b-1: 'og dang steng du dus kyi me //
T02TD1363E:179b-2: de ni shes rab gsum po'o //
T02TD1363E:179b-3: de yi 'od kyis bdag nyid ni //
T02TD1363E:179b-4: zla ba bzhin du zhu bar blta //
T02TD1363E:179b-5: mthong nas 'dir yang bskul ba dang //
T02TD1363E:179b-6: cho ga thams cad sngar bzhin du //
T02TD1363E:179b-7: gcig ni srog 'byung ched du ste //
T02TD1363E:179b-8: gzhan ni brgyad gnyis lo yi mthar //
T02TD1363E:179b-9: bde bar skyed pa'i ched du'o //
T02TD1363E:179b-10: mngal skyes rnams kyi srog rlung dang //
T02TD1363E:179b-11: khams rnams ji bzhin bskyed pa dang //
T02TD1363E:179b-12: rnam shes rab tu sad byed pa //
T02TD1363E:179b-13: de bzhin spyan ma la sogs rnams //
T02TD1363E:179b-14: ye shes rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD1363E:179b-15: dung can ma la brten pa'i sems //
T02TD1363E:179b-17: 'gro ba'i don phyir rdo rje can //
T02TD1363E:179b-18: glu gsan rdo rje che ldan pa //
T02TD1363E:179b-19: khu ba'i gzugs ni dor nas kyang //
T02TD1363E:179b-21: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas //
T02TD1363E:179b-22: 'khyud tsam nyid kyis gzhon du ni //
T02TD1363E:179b-23: sna tshogs yum dang lhan cig bzhengs //
T02TD1363E:179b-24: byis pa rnams la srog la sogs //
T02TD1363E:179b-25: rlung bcu nges par 'bab pa ste //
T02TD1363E:179b-27: sku rdzogs pa yi mtshan nyid can //
T02TD1363E:179b-29: mchog gi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya //
T02TD1363E:179b-30: nye bar bsgrub pa'i yan lag kyang //
T02TD1363E:179b-31: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa ste //
T02TD1363E:179b-32: byis pa'i yul dang dbang po dag / yang dag sad pa'i dbye ba las //
T02TD1363E:179b-33: gsung ni mngon du rdzogs gyur pa //
T02TD1363E:179b-34: rnam pa nyi shus rdzogs byang chub //
T02TD1363E:179b-35: bskyed rim rnam gnyis shes bya ste //
T02TD1363E:179b-36: sgong skyes dang ni mngal nas skyes //
T02TD1363E:179b-37: de ni 'jig rten khams bskyed dang //
T02TD1363E:179b-38: mi rnams bskyed pa nyid kyang ngo //
T02TD1363E:179b-39: skad cig gis ni bskyed pa gang //
T02TD1363E:179b-40: de ni rdzus te skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD1363E:179b-41: rgyal bas sems can bsam dbang las //
T02TD1363E:179b-42: de yang bskyed pa'i rim par gsungs //
T02TD1363E:179b-43: gang du bskyed pa'i rim pa de'i //
T02TD1363E:179b-44: rtog pa'i dra ba spangs pa ni //
T02TD1363E:179b-45: nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba //
T02TD1363E:179b-46: zhes sogs rnams kyis rab tu brjod //
T02TD1363E:179b-47: byis pa btsas pa'i srog gang dag / dbu ma aa ba dh'u t'ir gnas //
T02TD1363E:179b-48: de las byung nas dbang po drug / rnam shes yul rnams dang lhan cig / rab 'jug des na 'od sngon po //
T02TD1363E:179b-49: rdo rje shugs ni mkhas pas spro //
T02TD1363E:179b-50: rkang pa brgyad pa'i shing rta zhon //
T02TD1363E:179b-51: h'um yig rdo rje las byung ba //
T02TD1363E:179b-52: 'od zer rnon pos nam mkha' khyab //
T02TD1363E:180a-2: bdud dang nyon mongs mthar byed pa //
T02TD1363E:180a-3: gtso des ye shes 'khor lo dgug / lte bar lcags kyu bsnun byas shing //
T02TD1363E:180a-4: mtshon cha rnams kyis 'jigs byas te //
T02TD1363E:180a-5: nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i phyag rnams kyang //
T02TD1363E:180a-6: 'di yi zhags pas rab bcings te //
T02TD1363E:180a-7: bsgrub par byas nas rang gnas su ;
T02TD1363E:180a-8: /'ong bar rnam par bsgom par bya //
T02TD1363E:180a-9: byis pa'i sna tshogs yul rnams ni //
T02TD1363E:180a-10: mtha' dag dngos po'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1363E:180a-11: bskyod nas gnyug ma'i gnas su ni //
T02TD1363E:180a-12: rnam shes 'jug pa de ji bzhin //
T02TD1363E:180a-13: kun gzhi las skyes mig dang lus //
T02TD1363E:180a-14: lce dang sna yi dbang po rnams //
T02TD1363E:180a-15: rnam dag rmugs byed rengs byed dang //
T02TD1363E:180a-16: khengs byed dang ni shin tu stobs //
T02TD1363E:180a-17: rim bzhin gzhug dang bcing ba dang //
T02TD1363E:180a-18: de bzhin mnyes dang ro mnyam byed //
T02TD1363E:180a-19: dza: h'um bam ho: rim nyid dang //
T02TD1363E:180a-20: lcags kyu rdo rje zhags pa dang //
T02TD1363E:180a-21: dril bu hri: las byung dbyug pa //
T02TD1363E:180a-22: de rnams sa bon mtshan ma nyid //
T02TD1363E:180a-23: de bzhin sngar bzhin legs mchod nas //
T02TD1363E:180a-24: ye shes 'khor lo cho ga bzhin //
T02TD1363E:180a-25: myur du dam tshig 'khor lo dang //
T02TD1363E:180a-26: gcig tu gyur pa rnam bsgom bya //
T02TD1363E:180a-27: yab yum sa bon h'um dang phrem //
T02TD1363E:180a-28: phung po khams dang dbang po yul //
T02TD1363E:180a-29: thung du ring po yon tan sogs //
T02TD1363E:180a-30: 'di ni aom dang chos dbyings a'a: //
T02TD1363E:180a-31: ham ha: gtsug tor shin tu sngo //
T02TD1363E:180a-32: ha h'a gnod mdzes drag ldan ma //
T02TD1363E:180a-33: yam ram wam lam khro bo bzhi //
T02TD1363E:180a-34: l'a: b'a: r'a: y'a: khro mo rnams //
T02TD1363E:180a-35: ya ra la wa dbyug sngon dang //
T02TD1363E:180a-37: srung ba'i 'khor lo gzhan du bshad //
T02TD1363E:180a-38: l'a w'a y'a r'a khor mo rnams //
T02TD1363E:180a-39: aa aa: a'a aam ha ha: h'a //
T02TD1363E:180a-40: ham rnams phyogs dang mtshams rim bzhin //
T02TD1363E:180a-41: nag mo 'bar sogs du ba sogs //
T02TD1363E:180a-42: aom a'a: ho: h'um rim pa bzhin //
T02TD1363E:180a-43: yid bzhin nor bu la sogs rnams //
T02TD1363E:180a-44: hi h'i hri hr'i hli hl'i hu //
T02TD1363E:180a-45: h'um rnams bum pa rnams kyi'o //
T02TD1363E:180a-46: ha ksha ha: ksha: h'a ksha dang //
T02TD1363E:180a-47: ham ksham tsa rtsi ka sogs rim //
T02TD1363E:180a-48: phyogs kyi padma'i mdun rgyab kyi //
T02TD1363E:180a-49: 'dab ma gnyis la hi h'i dang //
T02TD1363E:180a-50: hri hr'i hli hl'i hu h'u rnams //
T02TD1363E:180a-51: phyogs bral padma'i mdun rgyab kyi //
T02TD1363E:180a-52: 'dab ma gnyis su kshi ksh'i dang //
T02TD1363E:180a-53: kshri kshr'i kshli kshl'i kshu ksh'u rnams //
T02TD1363E:180a-55: lhag ma rnams su ya la sogs //
T02TD1363E:180b-0: thung ngu'i dbyangs kyis phye ba drug / phyogs bral padma'i 'dab @180b ma ni //
T02TD1363E:180b-1: lhag ma rnams su ya la sogs //
T02TD1363E:180b-2: ring po'i dbyangs kyis phye ba drug //
T02TD1363E:180b-3: tsa sde la sogs sde pa drug / ya na'i sde pa ha ksha ldan //
T02TD1363E:180b-4: rnam bcad bcas dang thig ler bcas //
T02TD1363E:180b-7: lte ba bcu gnyis rnams su ni //
T02TD1363E:180b-8: bden bral sogs kyi tsa nya: dang //
T02TD1363E:180b-10: khyab 'jug mthar byed dbang ldan dang //
T02TD1363E:180b-11: nor sbyin kam nga: sam ka: 'o //
T02TD1363E:180b-12: 'dab ma rnams la nya nyi sogs //
T02TD1363E:180b-13: ring dang thung dus phye ba drug //
T02TD1363E:180b-14: phyi nas brtsams te dgod par bya //
T02TD1363E:180b-15: dzri ni lte bar shes rab ma //
T02TD1363E:180b-16: rlung lha'i padmar ts'a la sogs //
T02TD1363E:180b-17: ring po'i dbyangs ldan 'byung ba ste //
T02TD1363E:180b-18: 'di ni sdud pa'i dbye ba las //
T02TD1363E:180b-19: dzr'i ni lte bar shes rab ma'o //
T02TD1363E:180b-20: khyi gdong ma sogs lha mo yi //
T02TD1363E:180b-21: sa bon brtsegs par rnam sgom ste //
T02TD1363E:180b-22: shar du ka sde brtsegs pa can //
T02TD1363E:180b-23: la thog ksha tha'i pa na lho //
T02TD1363E:180b-24: nub tu sa 'og brtsegs pa dang //
T02TD1363E:180b-25: la thog ta tha'i ya na byang //
T02TD1363E:180b-26: zur du ca ta ta pa sogs //
T02TD1363E:180b-27: kun nas brtsegs pa'i sa bon no //
T02TD1363E:180b-28: rgyal ba'i h'um dang rnam rgyal ksh'u //
T02TD1363E:180b-29: shin tu sngon mo rdo rje mig //
T02TD1363E:180b-30: rnam bcad bcas dang thig ler bcas //
T02TD1363E:180b-31: ka sa dang po'i sde ba brtsegs //
T02TD1363E:180b-32: 'byung po bye ba phyed dang bzhi //
T02TD1363E:180b-33: ma lus sa bon sna tshogs pa'o //
T02TD1363E:180b-34: 'dir ni btsas pa'i byis pa rnams //
T02TD1363E:180b-35: nges par gnas skabs gsum du 'gyur //
T02TD1363E:180b-36: sang dang rmi lam gnyid log nyid //
T02TD1363E:180b-37: des na sku sogs byin gyis brlab //
T02TD1363E:180b-38: dpral ba mgrin pa snying ga dang //
T02TD1363E:180b-39: lte ba gsang ba gtsug tor te //
T02TD1363E:180b-40: aom a'a: h'um ho: de bzhin du //
T02TD1363E:180b-41: sv'a h'a sa rim bzhin byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD1363E:180b-42: byin gyis brlab pa 'di nyid ni //
T02TD1363E:180b-43: bis pa ma yis 'khyud dang mtshungs //
T02TD1363E:180b-44: de bzhin bdag po rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1363E:180b-45: lha mo'i tshogs kyis bkru bar bya //
T02TD1363E:180b-46: dpral bar aam las byung zla bar //
T02TD1363E:180b-47: aom las 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa //
T02TD1363E:180b-48: las byung sku'i rdo rje dkar //
T02TD1363E:180b-49: zhal gsum g-yas g-yon nag dang dmar //
T02TD1363E:180b-50: phyag drug g-yas na 'khor lo dang //
T02TD1363E:180b-52: ral gri dril bu nor bu g-yon //
T02TD1363E:180b-53: shes rab lhan cig ral pa 'dzin //
T02TD1363E:180b-54: dpral ba nas ni de phyung ste //
T02TD1363E:180b-55: de yis nam mkha' kun nas dgong //
T02TD1363E:180b-56: sku yi rdo rje'i gdul bya la //
T02TD1363E:180b-57: chos ston bya ba mdzad nas slar //
T02TD1363E:180b-58: bkug ste mdun du bzhag pa la //
T02TD1363E:180b-59: dbang bskur don du gsol ba gdab //
T02TD1363E:181a-2: / sku yi rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams //
T02TD1363E:181a-3: bdag la mngon par dbang bskur gsol //
T02TD1363E:181a-4: sku yi rigs las byung ba yi //
T02TD1363E:181a-5: lha mo rnams kyis bdud rtsi yis //
T02TD1363E:181a-6: gang ba'i bum pas dbang bskur zhing //
T02TD1363E:181a-7: byin gyis brlab par yang ni bya //
T02TD1363E:181a-8: dpral bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD1363E:181a-9: sku yi rdo rje bcug nas ni //
T02TD1363E:181a-10: de la gsol ba gdab pa yi //
T02TD1363E:181a-11: tshigs bcad 'di gnyis brjod par bya //
T02TD1363E:181a-12: dpal ldan sku yi rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD1363E:181a-13: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
T02TD1363E:181a-14: sku yi rdo rje can gyis ni //
T02TD1363E:181a-15: byin rlabs gnas su deng bdag mdzod //
T02TD1363E:181a-16: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD1363E:181a-17: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas //
T02TD1363E:181a-18: sku yi rdo rje can gyis ni //
T02TD1363E:181a-19: byin rlabs gnas su ding bdag mdzod //
T02TD1363E:181a-20: mgrin par re pha las byung ba'i //
T02TD1363E:181a-21: nyi mar aa yig gyur las skyes //
T02TD1363E:181a-23: de las gsung gi rdo rje bsgom //
T02TD1363E:181a-24: shes rab dang bcas rtsa zhal dmar //
T02TD1363E:181a-25: g-yon dang cig shos dkar dang nag / chu skyes rdo rje 'khor lo g-yas //
T02TD1363E:181a-26: nor bu dril bu ral gri g-yon //
T02TD1363E:181a-27: snga ma bzhin du phyung nas ni //
T02TD1363E:181a-28: lhag ma ming tsam gzhan tha dad //
T02TD1363E:181a-29: de bzhin snying gar thig le las //
T02TD1363E:181a-30: byung ba'i sgra gcan dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD1363E:181a-31: sngon po der yang h'um yig las //
T02TD1363E:181a-32: yang dag bskyed pa'i rtse lnga pa //
T02TD1363E:181a-33: rdo rje de yongs gyur pa las //
T02TD1363E:181a-34: thugs kyi rdo rje rnam par bsgom //
T02TD1363E:181a-35: shes rab bcas shing rtsa zhal nas //
T02TD1363E:181a-36: gzhan dag dmar dar dkar po nyid //
T02TD1363E:181a-37: rdo rje 'khor lo chu skyes g-yas //
T02TD1363E:181a-38: dril bu rin chen ral gri g-yon //
T02TD1363E:181a-39: phyung nas snga ma bzhin du ste //
T02TD1363E:181a-40: thams cad rgyas par ma bris so //
T02TD1363E:181a-41: de nas gcig nyid sngags 'di yis //
T02TD1363E:181a-42: nga rgyal kun du gzung bar bya //
T02TD1363E:181a-43: ao sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya w'a ktsitta badzra sva bh'a b'a tma ko& ham /
T02TD1363E:181a-44: de bzhin kho na shes rab kyi //
T02TD1363E:181a-45: lte ba'i phyogs su ho: yig ste //
T02TD1363E:181a-46: gsang bar sv'a yig gtsug tor du //
T02TD1363E:181a-47: h'a yig rigs drug dgod par bya //
T02TD1363E:181a-48: khu ba gcig pu'i chos las ni //
T02TD1363E:181a-49: gang phyir thabs ni rigs gsum nyid //
T02TD1363E:181a-50: rdul dang khru ba'i bdag nyid kyis //
T02TD1363E:181a-51: shes rab kyi ni rigs drug 'gyur //
T02TD1363E:181a-52: dbang bskur de nas de ma thag / rang rang rigs bdag gis rgyas gdab //
T02TD1363E:181a-53: rgyas 'debs sangs rgyas kun kyang ni //
T02TD1363E:181a-54: gtsug tor chos gos 'dzin shes bya //
T02TD1363E:181a-55: rdo rje sems dpa' yang der 'dir //
T02TD1363E:181b-0: sngon po mi bskyod mtshungs par @181b 'gyur ;
T02TD1363E:181b-1: / sangs rgyas rnam shes rgyas btab pa //
T02TD1363E:181b-2: sangs rgyas rgyas btab sangs rgyas skyes //
T02TD1363E:181b-3: ye shes rnam shes kyis rgyas btab //
T02TD1363E:181b-4: rnam shes ye shes kyis rgyas btab //
T02TD1363E:181b-5: 'di ni las kyi rgyal po mchog / bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid ji srid pa'o //
T02TD1363E:181b-6: zhes pa de ltar rdo rje can //
T02TD1363E:181b-7: srid gsum thams cad dkyil 'khor te //
T02TD1363E:181b-8: phyi dang lus dang gzhan la yang //
T02TD1363E:181b-9: de rnams spro dang sdud pa ste //
T02TD1363E:181b-10: dngos po'i rigs rnams la ni de //
T02TD1363E:181b-11: mkha' khams bzhin du yang dag gnas //
T02TD1363E:181b-12: rnam gsum srid par gnas pa de //
T02TD1363E:181b-13: mi rtag nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1363E:181b-14: gang phyir mig 'phrul ji lta bzhin //
T02TD1363E:181b-16: de bzhin rtag dang mi rtag pa //
T02TD1363E:181b-17: mtshungs mthong mi shes yid can rnams //
T02TD1363E:181b-18: dag phyir 'jig rten bden pa yis //
T02TD1363E:181b-19: rdo rje can gyi sgrub thabs brjod //
T02TD1363E:181b-20: sku gcig yum dang ldan pa'am //
T02TD1363E:181b-21: yang na lha mo dgu dang ldan //
T02TD1363E:181b-22: nyi shu lnga pa'i bdag nyid sogs //
T02TD1363E:181b-23: rgyal bas gdul bya'i bsam pas gsungs //
T02TD1363E:181b-24: 'dir ni sems kyi ngo bo yis //
T02TD1363E:181b-25: gnas pa'i bsgrub bya 'ga' yang med //
T02TD1363E:181b-26: bsgrub bya gang zhig sgrub pa po //
T02TD1363E:181b-27: rdo rje can gyis bsgrub pa 'khrul //
T02TD1363E:181b-28: de phyir rang sems dri ma bral //
T02TD1363E:181b-29: dkyil 'khor gyi ni gtso bor bya //
