T02TD1363E:181b-30: da ni thig le phra mo sogs //
T02TD1363E:181b-31: rnal 'byor bzlas pa brjod par bya //
T02TD1363E:181b-32: gang phyir mi rnams bcu drug los //
T02TD1363E:181b-33: thig le'i bde ba kun du 'byung //
T02TD1363E:181b-34: sems mchog thig le rdzogs pa ni //
T02TD1363E:181b-35: thig le'i rnal 'byor zhes byar brjod //
T02TD1363E:181b-36: 'dzag pa'i bde la dmigs pa ni //
T02TD1363E:181b-37: phra mo'i rnal 'byor zhes byar brjod //
T02TD1363E:181b-38: mi rnams lag pa 'dzin pa dang //
T02TD1363E:181b-39: shes rab ma yang gtod par byed //
T02TD1363E:181b-40: dbang brtul la sogs rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1363E:181b-41: las dang ye shes phyag rgya ste //
T02TD1363E:181b-42: rnal 'byor gnyis dang de bzhin bzlas //
T02TD1363E:181b-43: rtsa ba'i rgyud bzhin brjod par bya //
T02TD1363E:181b-44: bcu drug lo 'am rig ldan ma //
T02TD1363E:181b-45: gzugs dang lang tshos brgyan pa la //
T02TD1363E:181b-46: dang por legs par bslab byas te //
T02TD1363E:181b-47: dbang bskur nas ni bsgrub pa brtsam //
T02TD1363E:181b-48: sku gsung thugs byin brlab pa ni //
T02TD1363E:181b-49: dpral ba la sogs rnams la dgod //
T02TD1363E:181b-50: sv'a h'a gsang ba gtsug tor che //
T02TD1363E:181b-51: de nas padma rnam par sbyangs //
T02TD1363E:181b-52: aa yig dam pa 'dab brgyad pa //
T02TD1363E:181b-53: h'um yig gis ni rdo rje ldan //
T02TD1363E:181b-54: de bzhin rdo rje dang bcas pa'i //
T02TD1363E:181b-55: shes rab padma bskyod rgyu las //
T02TD1363E:181b-56: h'um gis rang gi rdo rje ni //
T02TD1363E:182a-0: @182a * // rtse mo lnga par rnam par bsgom //
T02TD1363E:182a-2: a'a yig gis ni rab tu brtags //
T02TD1363E:182a-3: de ltar rdo rje padma dang //
T02TD1363E:182a-4: bcas par byas nas padmar bzhugs //
T02TD1363E:182a-5: de ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa'i snye mas //
T02TD1363E:182a-7: bha gar lingga rab bkod nas //
T02TD1363E:182a-8: byang chub sems sems ni spro mi bya //
T02TD1363E:182a-9: khams gsum po ni ma lus nas //
T02TD1363E:182a-10: sangs rgyas gzugs su bsgom par bya //
T02TD1363E:182a-11: aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a b'a tma ko& ham //
T02TD1363E:182a-12: lte bar gtum mo 'bar ba yis //
T02TD1363E:182a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs shing //
T02TD1363E:182a-14: spyan ma mig la sogs pa yang //
T02TD1363E:182a-15: bsregs nas ri bong can ham 'dzag /
T02TD1363E:182a-16: bdud rtsi khu ba'i chos can ni //
T02TD1363E:182a-17: thig le'i gzugs kyis 'dzag par byed //
T02TD1363E:182a-18: thig le'i rnal 'byor zhes grags pa //
T02TD1363E:182a-19: bcu drug phyed phyed thig le 'chang //
T02TD1363E:182a-20: phra mo'i rnal 'byor zhes grags pa //
T02TD1363E:182a-21: rgyu mthun la sogs steng du 'gro //
T02TD1363E:182a-22: dung can ma'i phyag rgya che //
T02TD1363E:182a-23: de ni gtum mo rab tu brjod //
T02TD1363E:182a-24: lte ba'i steng du g-yung mo gang //
T02TD1363E:182a-25: aa ba dh'u t'i mi yi sna //
T02TD1363E:182a-26: 'od zer lnga yi rang bzhin sogs //
T02TD1363E:182a-28: sna rtser yungs kar du grags pa //
T02TD1363E:182a-29: de yang srog dang rtsol bar bshad //
T02TD1363E:182a-30: khams gsum po ni ma lus nas //
T02TD1363E:182a-31: srid pa gsum ni yongs shes pa //
T02TD1363E:182a-32: srog 'gog pa ni yungs kar ma //
T02TD1363E:182a-33: de yang rgyu bcas rgyu med du'o //
T02TD1363E:182a-34: so sor sdud pa phyag rgya che //
T02TD1363E:182a-35: nam mkha' stong pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1363E:182a-36: gang zhig kho nar yid dag ni //
T02TD1363E:182a-37: bkod pa de yi phyogs su snang //
T02TD1363E:182a-38: mtshan ma'i mthar ni re kh'a gang //
T02TD1363E:182a-39: de la brtan dang g-yo ba'i gzugs //
T02TD1363E:182a-40: rnal 'byor bsam gtan sogs de yang //
T02TD1363E:182a-42: de ltar rnam pa sna tshogs sogs //
T02TD1363E:182a-43: man ngag ji bzhin rab dbye bas //
T02TD1363E:182a-44: dga' ba'i thig le gtso bo las //
T02TD1363E:182a-45: sku gsung thugs dang bzhi par grags //
T02TD1363E:182a-46: rgyu mthun la sogs rim pa yis //
T02TD1363E:182a-47: je ltar byon pa de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1363E:182a-48: dpral ba sogs dang lte ba sogs //
T02TD1363E:182a-49: shes rab chos 'byung bdag nyid la'o //
T02TD1363E:182a-50: gang tshe thig le phra mos kyang //
T02TD1363E:182a-51: dus gsum pa yi srid gsum shes //
T02TD1363E:182a-52: du ba la sogs mtshan ma'i mtha' //
T02TD1363E:182a-53: mthar thug gzugs brnyan mthong bar byed //
T02TD1363E:182a-55: 'khor lo spro ba nyid dang yang //
T02TD1363E:182a-56: 'khor ba spro pa rnams bu sogs spro //
T02TD1363E:182b-0: de @182b bzhin sgrub pa chen po'o //
T02TD1363E:182b-1: lus dang dbyer med sngags bzlas pa //
T02TD1363E:182b-2: de yang srog dang rtsol bar bshad //
T02TD1363E:182b-3: lus ngag sems kyi rtsa rnams ni //
T02TD1363E:182b-4: g-yas dang g-yon dang dbu ma ru //
T02TD1363E:182b-5: glog las gzhom du med pa'i skad //
T02TD1363E:182b-6: yan lag drug gis de bzhin bzlas //
T02TD1363E:182b-7: so sor sdud dang bsam gtan dang //
T02TD1363E:182b-8: srog rtsol de bzhin 'dzin pa dang //
T02TD1363E:182b-9: rjes su dran dang ting nge 'dzin //
T02TD1363E:182b-11: dbu ma mchog gi dbugs dang ni //
T02TD1363E:182b-12: dri yi chu dang bcas pa yis //
T02TD1363E:182b-13: rtag tu rig sngags ma mchod bya //
T02TD1363E:182b-14: khyad par dus kyi pho nya mo //
T02TD1363E:182b-15: drang ba'i don du rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD1363E:182b-16: thun mong dngos grub 'dod pas kyang //
T02TD1363E:182b-17: bgrang phreng la sogs chog yis //
T02TD1363E:182b-18: rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pas bzla //
T02TD1363E:182b-19: las kun pa la rdo rje bzhi //
T02TD1363E:182b-20: 'jig rten khams mthar sv'a h'a sbyar //
T02TD1363E:182b-21: gang tshe rnal 'byor bzlas pas skyo //
T02TD1363E:182b-22: rnam par g-yeng ba'i sems ldan na //
T02TD1363E:182b-23: mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog sogs kyi //
T02TD1363E:182b-24: bstod pa byas nas rab mchod de //
T02TD1363E:182b-25: gtsug tor spyi bo mgrin snying ga / lte ba gsang ba rnams su ni //
T02TD1363E:182b-26: rdo rje rtse mo bzhi pa dang //
T02TD1363E:182b-27: rtse mo bcu drug par rnams bcas //
T02TD1363E:182b-28: rtse mo sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams //
T02TD1363E:182b-29: bsams nas de yi lte dbus gshegs //
T02TD1363E:182b-30: las dang bya ba'i 'khor lor yang //
T02TD1363E:182b-31: sum cu pa dang rtse lnga par //
T02TD1363E:182b-32: ji ltar rigs par gshegs gsol bya //
T02TD1363E:182b-33: dung dang gand'i nor bu ljon //
T02TD1363E:182b-34: du sogs phung khams lha dang bcas //
T02TD1363E:182b-35: bde ba chen po'i gnas su'o //
T02TD1363E:182b-36: skye mched bcu gnyis khro bo dang /
T02TD1363E:182b-37: rtsa rtsi k'a sogs shing rtar gnas //
T02TD1363E:182b-38: 'od zer can sogs lha mo dang //
T02TD1363E:182b-39: klu dang khyi gdong ma la sogs //
T02TD1363E:182b-40: ji ltar rigs pas gshegs gsol bya //
T02TD1363E:182b-41: rnal 'byor pa yis thun gsum du //
T02TD1363E:182b-42: sngar bshad chogs bdud rtsi lnga //
T02TD1363E:182b-43: legs par sbyangs te gtor ma sbyin //
T02TD1363E:182b-44: rnal 'byor dbang pos nyin so sor //
T02TD1363E:182b-45: bdag nyid tshim par bya ba yang //
T02TD1363E:182b-46: skyil krung dang ni so rnams nyid //
T02TD1363E:182b-47: cung zad phye zhing bkug nas bskyod //
T02TD1363E:182b-48: yang na dpral bar thig le dkar //
T02TD1363E:182b-49: bsams nas yongs su ngal ba bso //
T02TD1363E:182b-50: aom a'a: h'um ho: rim gnas pa //
T02TD1363E:182b-51: de yis sbyangs dang rtogs pa dang //
T02TD1363E:182b-52: 'bar ba dang ni bdud rtsir bya //
T02TD1363E:182b-53: mthe bong ming med dag gis ni //
T02TD1363E:182b-54: snod de chang gi thigs pa yis //
T02TD1363E:182b-55: phyi rol du ni gru gsum dang //
T02TD1363E:183a-2: nyi ma'i gzugs ltar rab gsal ba //
T02TD1363E:183a-3: de yid dbus su ye shes kyi //
T02TD1363E:183a-4: 'khor lo srid gsum mchog bsgoms nas //
T02TD1363E:183a-5: tshim pa sogs pa la 'bad par bya //
T02TD1363E:183a-6: de bzhin nang gi dkyil 'khor yang //
T02TD1363E:183a-7: sngar bzhin zas dang khrus dang ni //
T02TD1363E:183a-8: lha mo'i tshogs kyis dbang bskur ro //
T02TD1363E:183a-9: nyal tshe stong pa nyid la gzhug / ldang cho glu yis bskul ba ste //
T02TD1363E:183a-10: dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo yi //
T02TD1363E:183a-11: rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rtag tu dran bya //
T02TD1363E:183a-12: yul bdag grong bdag dag la yang //
T02TD1363E:183a-14: 'phrog ma la ni chang bu gnyis //
T02TD1363E:183a-15: pho nya mo la phud kyi ni //
T02TD1363E:183a-16: chang bus la gzhag par bya //
T02TD1363E:183a-17: zos lhag 'byung po rnams la ste //
T02TD1363E:183a-18: sbyin pa'i tshigs bcad brjod bar bya //
T02TD1363E:183a-20: gal te g-yo ba'i sems dbang las //
T02TD1363E:183a-21: nam zhig shi bar gyur pa na //
T02TD1363E:183a-22: dpal ldan mi yi 'jig rten du //
T02TD1363E:183a-23: rab mchog rigs su skye bar shog / der yang sngon goms rnal 'byor ldan //
T02TD1363E:183a-24: ye shes rnal 'byor rab yangs pa //
T02TD1363E:183a-25: de la slar yang spyod byed cing //
T02TD1363E:183a-26: tshogs gnyis yang dag bsags pa las //
T02TD1363E:183a-27: mi 'gyur mchog gi go 'phang gi / ye shes nges par thob gyur te //
T02TD1363E:183a-28: gang du'ang skye ldan min gyur cig / ces bya'o //
T02TD1363E:183a-29: rdo rje slob dpon las kyi chog la //
T02TD1363E:183a-30: sngon du nan tan bya ba gang yin pa //
T02TD1363E:183a-31: rgyas 'grel mdzad pa'i mkhyen ltar sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02TD1363E:183a-32: 'di ni rnal 'byor rab gsal zhes bya'o //
T02TD1363E:183a-33: mkhas pa'i man ngag dang bcas bris pa las //
T02TD1363E:183a-34: dge ba yangs pa bdag gis thob pa des //
T02TD1363E:183a-35: 'gro ba myur du mi 'gyur bde ba che //
T02TD1363E:183a-36: dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid gyur cig / dpal dus kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba dang po'i sangs rgyas su grags pa'i bskyed pa'i rim pa thams cad gtso bor gyur pa'i sgrub thabs dbu ma chen po'i pandi ta mee tri ba'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1363E:183a-38: // /'di'i gzhung gi tshad ni cung zad lhag pa'i bzhi brgya'o //
T02TD1363E:183a-40: gcig tu bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa rin po che la gces sbras mdzad cing /
T02TD1363E:183a-41: lung dang mngon par rtogs pa'i yon tan rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mnga' 'byor bas thub pa'i dbang po dang gnyis su med par lhar bcas skye dgu'i gtsug rgyan dpal ldan bla ma dam pa /
T02TD1363E:183b-0: zhva mar cod pan 'dzin pa bzhi pa'i zhal snga nas legs par sgyur cig ces bka' stsal pa @183b bzhin du //
T02TD1363E:183b-1: bstan pa rin po che gus pas mchod pa'i sa skyong chos kyi spyan ldan dpon chen kun dga' rin chen rgyal po bas mthun rkyen stsal te /
T02TD1363E:183b-2: legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyi brda sprod pa'i gzhung gi cha tsam rtogs shing sngon gyi skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis dam pa'i chos ji ltar bsgyur ba'i tshul rjes su dpag pa las rtogs pa'i zha lu lo ts'a ba dge slong chos skyong bzang pos lugs gnyis kyi 'dun sa gzhis ka lhun grub gling gi skyed mos tshal du zil gnon gyi lo chu stod kyi zla ba'i tshes bcu drug la rdzogs par bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'i ye ge pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen bla ma shes rab 'phags pa zhes bgyi ba'o//
